T02D1784b:287a-9: 'chang gi go 'phang thob par byed pa'i rgyud ni
T02D1784b:287a-10: bya ba dang rnal 'byor la sogs pa phyi ma'i
T02D1784b:287a-11: phyi ma ste rnal 'byor phyi ma'i rgyud kyi yang
T02D1784b:287a-12: phyi ma rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do //
T02D1784b:287a-13: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi drin gyis ni kho bo cag gis re zhig rtogs so //
T02D1784b:287a-14: de ni dka' ba dang spangs pa'i tshig 'dri ba lan gyi sgo nas /
T02D1784b:287a-15: sems can ni spros te shes pa'i nyan pa po rnams la phan par 'dod pa ste /
T02D1784b:287a-16: rjes su gzung ba'i 'dod pas khyod ni rdo rje
T02D1784b:287a-17: 'chang chen po gcig rang bzhin khyed rnams la gsol
T02D1784b:287a-18: bar 'tshal ba ni zhu bar bya ba zhes bya
T02D1784b:287a-19: ba'i don to // de ni tshig go don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
T02D1784b:287a-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pas /
T02D1784b:287a-21: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad bka' stsal pa ni gsungs so //
T02D1784b:287a-22: kye byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa rnams la legs
T02D1784b:287a-23: so legs so zhes bya ba ni mgu bas tshig
T02D1784b:287a-24: gnyis so // de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D1784b:287a-25: pa spros te shes pa'i nyan pa po rnams kyi
T02D1784b:287a-26: sbas pa'i tshig gi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1784b:287a-28: gzhan gyi don byed pas yang legs par smra ba gnyis pa'o //
T02D1784b:287a-29: legs par smra ba'i rgyu bstan par bya ste /
T02D1784b:287a-30: gang zhig sbas pa'i tshig rgyud ces bya ba ni
T02D1784b:287a-31: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig
T02D1784b:287a-32: le'u re re la gnas pa rdo rje'i tshig gang
T02D1784b:287a-33: yin pa de dag thams cad do //
T02D1784b:287a-34: de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa ni khyod kyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rten dgongs pa'o //
T02D1784b:287a-35: de ni tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:287a-36: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la legs
T02D1784b:287a-37: par smra ba'i tshig nyan pas rab tu dga' ba
T02D1784b:287a-38: ni sems la gnas pa'i zab pa'i dri ba rtog
T02D1784b:287a-39: pa'i rab tu gsal ba'i phyir mig gdangs pa dang
T02D1784b:287a-40: / yang dang yang du dad pa'i shugs kyis phyag 'tshal zhing btud de /
T02D1784b:287b-0: 'di'i 'og nas bshad par @287b 'gyur ba'i som nyi
T02D1784b:287b-1: ni the tshom gyi zhus par gyur pa ni 'dri
T02D1784b:287b-3: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa ste snga ma dang sbyor ro //
T02D1784b:287b-4: de ni tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:287b-5: gsang ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1784b:287b-6: sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur //
T02D1784b:287b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar ni go sla'o //
T02D1784b:287b-8: don bsdus pa'i skabs su 'dri ba bdun cu rtsa gnyis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:287b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:287b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis zhus pa gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig ni zhus pa'i tshig go //
T02D1784b:287b-11: nye bar gsan pa ni gsan pa ste /
T02D1784b:287b-12: chen po ni ye shes gsum dang byang chub ni rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1784b:287b-13: rdo rje ni de rnams 'joms pa 'od gsal ba la dmigs shing zhugs te /
T02D1784b:287b-14: skad cig ni yud tsam ste /
T02D1784b:287b-15: mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de'i ting nge 'dzin la thugs rtse gcig par gyur to //
T02D1784b:287b-16: de ni sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:287b-18: zab mo'i don gsal ba'i don du dang po de
T02D1784b:287b-19: kho na nyid rjes su dran zhing de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:287b-21: de rnams kyis kyang 'od gsal ba khong du chud do zhes shes nas /
T02D1784b:287b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' nas ni des par
T02D1784b:287b-23: kho bo cag la de rnams kyi the tshom gcod
T02D1784b:287b-24: par 'gyur ro // gzhan du ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan la bzhugs par gyur ces bya'o //
T02D1784b:287b-25: de nyid kyi phyir snying rje'i bdag nyid ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
T02D1784b:287b-26: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thams cad mkhyen pa bde
T02D1784b:287b-27: bar gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid legs par mkhyen
T02D1784b:287b-28: pa mgon po ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi
T02D1784b:287b-29: ston pa la / yang dang yang du mi nyan par 'dod pas /
T02D1784b:287b-30: rab bskul ni kho bo cag la de rnams kyis
T02D1784b:287b-31: ji ltar the tshom chod par 'gyur zhes de rnams
T02D1784b:287b-32: kyi zhal la lta ba la brtson par 'gyur ro
T02D1784b:287b-34: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
T02D1784b:287b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1784b:287b-36: rnams la 'dri ba dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs
T02D1784b:287b-37: pa ni / kye byang chub sems dpa' ni byams
T02D1784b:287b-38: pa la sogs pas zhus pa rgya chen ni the
T02D1784b:287b-39: tshom rgya che ba'i lan ni /
T02D1784b:287b-40: mnyan par gyis shig ces bya ba ni nyon cig pa'o //
T02D1784b:287b-41: ji ltar nyon cig pa ni /
T02D1784b:287b-42: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1784b:288a-0: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung @288a * //
T02D1784b:288a-2: zhus pa rgya chen ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1784b:288a-5: pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1784b:288a-6: de ni tshig don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:288a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:288a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //

T02D1784b:288a-10: bskyod pa la sogs pa'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa
T02D1784b:288a-11: / rjes su gzung ba'i bka' ni /
T02D1784b:288a-12: rjes su gzung ba'i bka' lung /
T02D1784b:288a-13: spyi bos rab tu mnos pa ni dad pas rab tu blangs te /
T02D1784b:288a-14: rang rang gi ni rang rang gi bdag nyid kyi'o //
T02D1784b:288a-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin ni
T02D1784b:288a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dpal
T02D1784b:288a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:288a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de rnams la /
T02D1784b:288a-19: dmigs pa ni blangs te legs par smra ba mngon du 'gro bas so //
T02D1784b:288a-20: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni
T02D1784b:288a-21: chos bstan pa mnyan par bya ba'i phyir rtse gcig
T02D1784b:288a-22: pa nyid du gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1784b:288a-23: // de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:288a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:288a-25: chos la dad pa'i sems dang /
T02D1784b:288a-26: rtse gcig nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis /
T02D1784b:288a-27: rang gi thugs thugs rje chen po bskyed cing gsung
T02D1784b:288a-28: gcig gis de rnams kyi 'dri ba'i the tshom sel
T02D1784b:288a-29: bar bya ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni gsungs so
T02D1784b:288a-30: zhes bya ba'i don te sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:288a-31: sku gsung thugs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1784b:288a-32: la rnam pa gsum ni sku gsung thugs gsum ste

T02D1784b:288a-34: sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1784b:288a-35: dran pas stong pa nyid du zhugs pa de dag
T02D1784b:288a-36: thams cad nyan thos pa la sogs pa thob par
T02D1784b:288a-37: bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba zhes bya
T02D1784b:288a-39: de bzhin du sku la sogs pa gsum ni lha'i
T02D1784b:288a-40: rnam par spro ba gsang ba ste dkyil 'khor rgyal
T02D1784b:288a-41: ba mchog go // sku la sogs pa gsum 'od du zhu ba ni gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288a-42: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02D1784b:288a-43: 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa 'gro ba bskyed pa'i rgyu rtsa gsum gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288b-0: @288b sku la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba thig
T02D1784b:288b-1: le phra mo sna rtse gsum la gnas pa gsang
T02D1784b:288b-2: ba ste / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:288b-3: sku gsung thugs ni yi ge gsum 'jug pa la
T02D1784b:288b-4: sogs pa'i rim gyis 'od gsal ba'i gnas thob pas
T02D1784b:288b-5: gsang ba ste / rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:288b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyur gyur pa rnam pa gsum
T02D1784b:288b-7: ni rnam par shes pa dang rang bzhin gyi tshogs
T02D1784b:288b-8: te / de dag 'od gsal ba la thim pas na gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288b-9: sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:288b-10: sku gsung thugs ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa
T02D1784b:288b-11: dang sprul pa'i sku rnams 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba
T02D1784b:288b-12: 'od gsal las byung bas na gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288b-13: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:288b-14: chags pa dang chags pa bar ma dang chags pa

T02D1784b:288b-16: ste / de dag rim pa bzhi pas rnam par
T02D1784b:288b-17: dag pas na gsang ba ste mngon par byang chub
T02D1784b:288b-18: ste / pa'i rim pa'o // kun rdzob dang don
T02D1784b:288b-19: dam pa gnyis ka 'dres pa ni sku gsung thugs
T02D1784b:288b-21: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bor gnas pas na gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288b-23: sku la sogs pa rnam pa gsum ni sems dpa'
T02D1784b:288b-24: gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab ste
T02D1784b:288b-25: / de dag sbyor bas na gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:288b-26: sku gsung thugs ni rakta la sogs pa gsum gyis
T02D1784b:288b-27: byin gyis brlabs pa ni rdo rje dang padma ste
T02D1784b:288b-28: de dag sbyor ba ni gsang ba ste rgyu'o //
T02D1784b:288b-29: h'um dang phat la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyis
T02D1784b:288b-30: bskyed cing de nyid kyis mtshan pa rdo rje dang
T02D1784b:288b-31: padma bskyod pa ni gsang ba ste las so //
T02D1784b:288b-32: sku gsung thugs gsum ni bde ba chen po'i rang
T02D1784b:288b-33: bzhin zhi ba rtogs pas na gsang ba ste 'bras
T02D1784b:288b-34: bu'o // yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa ni gsum ste /
T02D1784b:288b-35: de dag phrad pas yul der nye bar spyod cing
T02D1784b:288b-36: sku la sogs pa bde ba bskyed pas na gsang
T02D1784b:288b-37: ba ste so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1784b:288b-38: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa gsum gyi rang
T02D1784b:288b-39: bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du rtogs
T02D1784b:288b-40: pa ni gsang ba ste bsam gtan no //
T02D1784b:288b-41: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas 'gro ba dang
T02D1784b:288b-42: 'od pa'i rim pas sbyor ba sku la sogs pa
T02D1784b:288b-43: gsum gyi rang bzhin yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad
T02D1784b:288b-44: tsam gyi thig le spro ba dang /
T02D1784b:288b-45: sdud pa ni gsang ba ste srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02D1784b:289a-1: gsum nye bar sdud par byed pas rdo rje la
T02D1784b:289a-2: sogs pa sna rtse gsum la thig le 'dzin pa
T02D1784b:289a-4: sku la sogs pa gsum gyi ngo bo de bzhin
T02D1784b:289a-5: gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i khams la spro ba
T02D1784b:289a-6: ni gsang ba ste rjes su dran pa'o //
T02D1784b:289a-7: sku la sogs pa gsum ste de nye bar sdud
T02D1784b:289a-8: cing mos pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mi gnas pa'i mya
T02D1784b:289a-9: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo'i rdo rje
T02D1784b:289a-10: 'chang chen po'i sku dmigs pa ni gsang ba ste
T02D1784b:289a-12: sku la sogs pa gsum ni bsrung ba dang bza'
T02D1784b:289a-13: ba'i dam tshig nyams su blang ba ni gsang ba
T02D1784b:289a-14: ste / dam tshig dang sku la sogs pa de

T02D1784b:289a-16: ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs kyi sgrub pa

T02D1784b:289a-19: gi don bcu drug bstan pas rgyud kyi don ma
T02D1784b:289a-21: 'dus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1784b:289a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad phung po'am de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289a-24: de ni rgyud kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:289a-25: zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon dang mtshan ma dang spro ba dang sku bskyed pa ste /
T02D1784b:289a-26: mngon par byang chub pa lnga dang /
T02D1784b:289a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang bsdu ba ste /
T02D1784b:289a-30: sku rdzogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa ni 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289a-31: las kyi rgyal pa mchog go //
T02D1784b:289a-32: rtsa rgyus stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis las byang
T02D1784b:289a-33: chub kyi sems spro bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D1784b:289a-34: rang bzhin khams gsum pa bskyed pas na 'dus pa
T02D1784b:289a-36: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pas rjes su
T02D1784b:289a-37: chags pa mchog gi sgras rgyal ba ma lus pa'i
T02D1784b:289a-38: tshogs zhugs shing rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor ro
T02D1784b:289a-39: gcig par gyur pa byang chub kyi sems kyi thig
T02D1784b:289a-40: le'i ngo bo ni 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289a-42: yang na rdo rje'i lam nas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1784b:289a-43: kyi thig le spro zhing padma'i lte ba'i nang du
T02D1784b:289a-44: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i gzugs su dam tshig gi dkyil
T02D1784b:289a-45: 'khor spro ba ni 'dus pa ste bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1784b:289b-0: pa'o // phyir mi @289b ldog pa'i dbang gi dus
T02D1784b:289b-1: su slob ma'i tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:289b-2: pa thams cad zhugs pa ni 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289b-3: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02D1784b:289b-4: yi ge phyi mo bzhi bcu rtsa dgu po pho
T02D1784b:289b-5: dang ma ning gi rtags kyi rang bzhin yi ge
T02D1784b:289b-6: gsum gyis bsdus pas na 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289b-7: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:289b-8: rang bzhin brgya drug cu shes rab dang thabs dang
T02D1784b:289b-9: ma rig pa gsum gyis bsdus pa na 'dus pa
T02D1784b:289b-10: ste / sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:289b-12: sku gsum ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyi sa bsdus pas na 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289b-13: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:289b-14: chags pa la sogs pa 'od gsal bas bsdus pas na 'dus pa ste /
T02D1784b:289b-15: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //

T02D1784b:289b-17: thabs dang shes rab yang dag par sbyor ba'i 'dus pa ste rgyu'o //
T02D1784b:289b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad ni aom la sogs pa dgod
T02D1784b:289b-19: cing rdo rje dang padma bskyod pa ni 'dus te
T02D1784b:289b-20: las so // phung po la sogs pa thams cad sdud pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:289b-21: don dam pa ni 'dus pa ste 'bras bu'o //
T02D1784b:289b-22: yul dang dbang po 'dus pa ste so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1784b:289b-23: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par bsgom pa ni 'dus pa ste bsam gtan no //
T02D1784b:289b-24: khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems yan lag thams cad las bskul te /
T02D1784b:289b-25: sna rtse gsum gyi gzhir bsdu zhing 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis spro ba dang /
T02D1784b:289b-26: bsdu bar bya ba ni 'dus pa ste srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02D1784b:289b-27: de nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa dang bral zhing
T02D1784b:289b-28: dang ba mar me'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar rgyun
T02D1784b:289b-30: de nyid las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1784b:289b-31: spro zhing nam mkha'i dbyings la khams gsum pa dkyil
T02D1784b:289b-32: 'khor gyi tshul du bsdus pa ni 'dus pa ste

T02D1784b:289b-35: kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sngar bsdus
T02D1784b:289b-36: pa ni 'dus pa ste ting nge 'dzin to //

T02D1784b:289b-38: thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbyang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:289b-39: rim gyis byang chub kyi sems ngo bor bsdus pa
T02D1784b:290a-0: de ltar tshig gi don bcu drug gis @290a * //
T02D1784b:290a-1: ston par byed pa gsang ba 'dus pa'i tshig 'di

T02D1784b:290a-3: ba'i bdag nyid ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud
T02D1784b:290a-4: yin no // de la rjod par byed pa ni
T02D1784b:290a-5: 'dus pa'i tshig yin la gsang ba'i tshig ni de'i
T02D1784b:290a-6: khyad par du gyur pa yin na yang brjod par

T02D1784b:290a-10: de nyid lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1784b:290a-11: lnga pa ni spyod pa'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-12: dgu pa ni de las gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig
T02D1784b:290a-13: nges par bshad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gal ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:290a-14: ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-15: bcu bdun pa dam tshig dang sdom pa'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-16: bcu gsum pa ni las rab 'byam gyi le'u rnams so //
T02D1784b:290a-17: sangs rgyas ni rdzogs pa'i rnal ba dang /
T02D1784b:290a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma rdzogs pa'i rnal
T02D1784b:290a-19: 'byor pa rnams kyis bstan pa sgrub pa ni 'dul
T02D1784b:290a-21: de bas na gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gtso bo yin pas chen po ste mchog go //
T02D1784b:290a-22: gang gi phyir spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis gdug
T02D1784b:290a-23: pa la sogs pa pha rol gyi rnam par shes
T02D1784b:290a-24: pa la sogs pa 'gugs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290a-25: zhi ba la sogs pa las rab 'byam dang /
T02D1784b:290a-26: dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sgo nas kyang rnal 'byor pas sems can gyi don bya'o zhes sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:290a-27: de bzhin du bzhi pa ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-28: bcu drug pa ni sku dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-29: brgyad pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ba bskur gyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-30: bcu gnyis pa ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa'i le'u ste /
T02D1784b:290a-31: slob dpon gyi lan ni slob dpon gyi bya ba dang /
T02D1784b:290a-32: spyi'i las ni slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dngos grub bstan pa dang /
T02D1784b:290a-33: brtul zhugs ni ji ltar mos pa dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290a-34: sdom pa ni lha'i rnam pa bsgom par bya ba ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:290a-35: de bzhin du drug pa ni sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-36: gnyis pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290a-37: bcu pa ni sngags kyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul pa'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290b-0: bcu bzhi pa ni sngags gtso bor gyur pa las rab 'byam gyi le'u ste drag spyod @290b ni /
T02D1784b:290b-1: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a k'a ya badzra sva
T02D1784b:290b-2: bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1784b:290b-3: pa dang / dngos po med par bsgom pa ni dngos zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-4: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-5: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddhi lo tsa ni sarbba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1784b:290b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:290b-7: rjes su chags pa ni bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1784b:290b-8: sku rdo rje la sogs pa byin gyis rlabs pa
T02D1784b:290b-9: dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-11: zhi ba la sogs pa byed pa ste /
T02D1784b:290b-12: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar sgrub pa ste rdo
T02D1784b:290b-13: rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang nye bar sgrub pa
T02D1784b:290b-14: dang / sdom pa ni bslab pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:290b-15: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang las kyi rgyal ba mchog dang sgrub pa rnams so //
T02D1784b:290b-16: bdun pa ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290b-17: gsum pa ni lha'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290b-18: bcu gcig pa ni sngags kyi rgyu dang ye shes sku'i le'u dang /
T02D1784b:290b-19: bco lnga pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku'i le'u ste /
T02D1784b:290b-20: dngos grub kyi zhing ni rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa lha'i sku'i rtags ni rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:290b-21: de nyid kyi phyir bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa
T02D1784b:290b-22: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgrub par byed pa
T02D1784b:290b-23: ste / rang gi don sgrub par byed pa'i gtso bo yin no //
T02D1784b:290b-24: gang gi phyir spyod pa dang rtogs pa'i lha pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-25: rtog pa dang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha bsgom pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-26: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis tha mal
T02D1784b:290b-27: ba'i sku rnam par dag pas khyad par lha'i go
T02D1784b:290b-31: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:290b-32: de ltar bdun pa la sogs pas rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-33: drug pa la sogs pas de nyid kyi thabs kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-34: lnga pa la sogs pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-35: bzhi pa la sogs pas de nyid kyi thabs kyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1784b:290b-36: de ltar rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ;
T02D1784b:290b-37: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:290b-38: de gnyis ka'i thabs kyi phun sum tshogs pa gtso bor gyur pa'i le'u bstan pa ni 'brel pa'o //
T02D1784b:290b-39: de'i le'u dang po ni 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1784b:290b-40: 'brel pa'i nang du ma bsdus pa dang /
T02D1784b:291a-0: de'i le'u bco brgyad pa ni rdo rje tshig rnam par bshad @291a * //
T02D1784b:291a-1: pa'i sgo nas rnams par grol ba'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1784b:291a-2: de ni 'brel pa brjod pa ma yin no //
T02D1784b:291a-3: kha cig na re le'u bzhi ni bsnyen pa la
T02D1784b:291a-4: sogs pa yan lag bzhi brjod pa zer ba de
T02D1784b:291a-6: gang gi phyir bsnyen pa la sogs pa spangs pa ni le'u gcig kyang mi dmigs te ;
T02D1784b:291a-7: thams cad de nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1784b:291a-8: khas blangs na yang 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:291a-10: gal te lnga la sogs pa sgrub pa chen po
T02D1784b:291a-11: nyid du 'dod na de'i tshe yi ge dgod pa'i
T02D1784b:291a-12: bdag nyid sgrub pa chen po med pa ste /
T02D1784b:291a-13: spyod pa dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa
T02D1784b:291a-14: dgug pa dang las kyi rab tu dbye ba dang
T02D1784b:291a-15: / dam tshig dang sdom pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:291a-16: bzhi pa la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor la zhugs
T02D1784b:291a-17: te slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don
T02D1784b:291a-18: du sku sgrub pa ni med de /
T02D1784b:291a-19: stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:291a-20: drug pa la sogs pa sa sku la sogs pa
T02D1784b:291a-21: byin gyis brlab par bsgrub pas ni sa bon bsdus
T02D1784b:291a-22: pa'i bdag nyid ni nye bar sgrub pa mi rigs
T02D1784b:291a-23: so // de nas bdun pa la sogs pas rang
T02D1784b:291a-24: gi don sgrub pa'i phyir lha'i sku bsgrubs na stong
T02D1784b:291a-25: pa nyid ni bsnyen pa med do //
T02D1784b:291a-26: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rjod par byed pa la bsnyen
T02D1784b:291a-27: pa la sogs pa la thabs dang shes rab snyoms
T02D1784b:291a-28: par zhugs pa la sogs pa ni lnga pa la
T02D1784b:291a-29: sogs pa'i don ma yin pa /
T02D1784b:291a-30: thabs bzhi pa'i rim gyis bsnyen pa la sogs pa mi rigs pa dang /
T02D1784b:291a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim gyis bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni mi rigs te /
T02D1784b:291a-32: ci'i phyir le'u bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la sogs pa brjod cing /
T02D1784b:291a-33: gzhan dag gis ni brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:291a-34: gang gi phyir re zhig dang por bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1784b:291a-35: pa la rdo rje bzhi pa'i rim pas stong pa
T02D1784b:291a-36: nyid dang sa bon bsdus pa dang /
T02D1784b:291a-37: gzugs rdzogs pa dang yi ge dgod pa la sogs
T02D1784b:291a-38: pa'i bdag nyid bsnyen pa la sogs pa yin no
T02D1784b:291a-39: // rdzogs pa'i rim pa la sogs pa yang thabs dang shes rab dang /
T02D1784b:291a-40: rdo rje padma dang yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
T02D1784b:291a-42: bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:291a-43: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang yan
T02D1784b:291b-0: lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom @291b pa ni bsnyen
T02D1784b:291b-1: pa'o // de bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa yang bsdum pa dang /
T02D1784b:291b-2: sbyin pa dang dbye ba dang /
T02D1784b:291b-3: chad pa dang bzhi ni bsnyen pa dang /
T02D1784b:291b-6: sgrub pa chen po yin no //
T02D1784b:291b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su yang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D1784b:291b-9: rang gi lhag pa'i lha dang /
T02D1784b:291b-10: rdo rje 'chang sgom pa ni bsnyen pa la sogs
T02D1784b:291b-11: pa yin no zhes bsdus nas bsnyen pa la sogs
T02D1784b:291b-12: pas dbye ba bcu drug ni rim pa gnyis kyi
T02D1784b:291b-14: de dang 'dra ba le'u la sogs pa la med
T02D1784b:291b-15: do zhes bsnyen pa la sogs pa rjod par byed
T02D1784b:291b-17: de bas na rang bzo nyid kyi 'chad pa pos 'jig rten pa'i 'khrul par byed de /
T02D1784b:291b-18: lung dang rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes ha
T02D1784b:291b-19: cang thal ches pas cho ga ste rnal ma'i don
