T02D1784b:291b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:291b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las ni phrin las te /
T02D1784b:291b-23: tshar gcod pa ni gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /
T02D1784b:291b-24: mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du zhugs pa
T02D1784b:291b-25: la sogs pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa dang
T02D1784b:291b-26: / phan 'dogs pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i phrin las 'jig rten pa dang /
T02D1784b:291b-27: lha'i sku sgrub pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02D1784b:291b-28: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa ste nus pa'o //
T02D1784b:291b-29: 'dul ba la ni dad pa la sogs pa'i yon
T02D1784b:291b-30: tan dang ldan pa gdul dka' ba ni dkon mchog
T02D1784b:291b-31: gsum la gnod par byed pa dang ;
T02D1784b:291b-32: zhi ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa
T02D1784b:291b-33: dang bral ba'i sems can ni sgye bo rnams so
T02D1784b:291b-34: // 'jug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho
T02D1784b:291b-35: na nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir nyes par
T02D1784b:291b-36: gsungs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1784b:291b-37: de bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa dang 'brel pa
T02D1784b:291b-38: ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas bsnyen pa la
T02D1784b:291b-39: sogs pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi ni rdo rje
T02D1784b:291b-41: dngos grub thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku thun mong ste /
T02D1784b:291b-42: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang bsgrub pa'i bsgom pa bcom
T02D1784b:291b-43: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D1784b:292a-0: rang gi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang @292a
T02D1784b:292a-2: le'u'i rim pas dgongs pa de ni bdag gi don to //
T02D1784b:292a-3: de ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1784b:292a-4: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:292a-5: ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la zhugs
T02D1784b:292a-6: pa'i slob ma la slob dpon gyis /
T02D1784b:292a-7: brtul zhugs ni sdom pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:292a-8: 'brel pa ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sngon du
T02D1784b:292a-9: 'gro ba'i thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i
T02D1784b:292a-10: dbang bskur dang / gzhung ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid pa'i tshig dang /
T02D1784b:292a-11: slob dpon phun sum tshogs pa ni rang dang gzhan
T02D1784b:292a-12: gyi don phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa
T02D1784b:292a-14: rdo rje 'chang gnyis kyi dbugs dbyung ba ston cing bla mas sngags kyi lam nas te /
T02D1784b:292a-15: gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho ga slob ma yongs su
T02D1784b:292a-16: smin par bya ba ni gdul bar bya ba gang
T02D1784b:292a-17: yin pa de ni dgos pa zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1784b:292a-18: te / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa bshad do //
T02D1784b:292a-19: dgos pa'i dgos pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:292a-20: brtul zhugs bzang po ni sdom pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1784b:292a-21: dbang bskur ba ni dbang thob pa dang /
T02D1784b:292a-22: bdag nyid che ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:292a-23: rim gyis rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang rtogs pas
T02D1784b:292a-24: so // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ni dbang po rno ba dang bar pa dang /
T02D1784b:292a-25: dman pa rnams la bstan pa'i sgo nas yongs su
T02D1784b:292a-26: grol ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par
T02D1784b:292a-27: dag cing 'od gsal ba nyid du bya ba gang
T02D1784b:292a-28: yin pa de ni dgos pa zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1784b:292a-30: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa shes rab
T02D1784b:292a-31: ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i mtshan
T02D1784b:292a-32: nyid de stong pa nyid do //
T02D1784b:292a-33: thabs ni thugs rje chen po'o //
T02D1784b:292a-34: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni rdo rje 'chang
T02D1784b:292a-35: gi sa bcu gsum pa la gnas pa bcom ldan
T02D1784b:292a-36: 'das kyi sgom pa mthar thug pa yang dag par
T02D1784b:292a-38: rgyas par bshad pa ni gang zhig dngos med ni thams cad stong pa shes rab ste /
T02D1784b:292a-39: phul du byung ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:292a-40: de bzhin du thabs nas dngos po'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1784b:292a-41: snying rje'i ming gi rang bzhin gyi rnam grangs te /
T02D1784b:292a-43: yang na shes rab ni stong pa nyid la sogs
T02D1784b:292a-44: pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgoms pas sprin
T02D1784b:292b-0: med nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bdag nyid @292b mthong
T02D1784b:292b-1: ba'o // thabs ni sa bon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i sgo nas sku bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:292b-2: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1784b:292b-4: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:292b-5: gang zhig dngos med ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa ste shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:292b-6: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid de 'gro ba'i don bya bar nus pa'i lha'i sku la dmigs la /
T02D1784b:292b-7: des ni 'gro ba'i don grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:292b-8: de ni dbang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1784b:292b-11: yang na shes rab ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu
T02D1784b:292b-12: rtsa gnyis kyi dbus su 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs
T02D1784b:292b-13: pa'i rtsa lnga'o // thabs ni de'i nang du rgyu ba byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1784b:292b-14: de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa ni dbus mar ro gcig par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1784b:292b-15: gang zhig dngos po ni bde ba chen po'i gzhir gyur pa rtsa rnams te shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:292b-16: thabs ni 'gro ba ma lus pa skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1784b:292b-17: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
T02D1784b:292b-18: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:292b-19: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:292b-20: shes rab ni phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi
T02D1784b:292b-21: rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon gsum mo
T02D1784b:292b-22: // thabs ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung gsum mo //
T02D1784b:292b-23: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis bzlas te /
T02D1784b:292b-24: gang zhig dngos med ni rdo rje 'chang go 'phang
T02D1784b:292b-25: 'od gsal ba de'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yi
T02D1784b:292b-26: ge gsum ste shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:292b-27: thabs dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1784b:292b-28: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na
T02D1784b:292b-29: nyid mtshon par gyur pas thabs ni rlung ngo //
T02D1784b:292b-30: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:292b-31: shes rab ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1784b:292b-32: thabs ni thabs kyi rang bzhin bzhi bcu'o //
T02D1784b:292b-33: snyoms par 'jug pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdun no //
T02D1784b:292b-34: rnal 'byor ni de dag 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1784b:292b-35: gang zhig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1784b:292b-36: sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:292b-37: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba
T02D1784b:292b-38: las cig car du spros pa de nyid snyoms par
T02D1784b:293a-2: gang zhig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D1784b:293a-3: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:293a-4: thabs dang shes rab ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1784b:293a-5: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni mngon du byed pas rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:293a-6: gang zhig dngos med ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin te shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:293a-7: dngos po ni khams gsum mi snang bar byed pa'i
T02D1784b:293a-8: mtshan nyid rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin te
T02D1784b:293a-9: thabs so // de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:293a-10: shes rab dang thabs ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob ste /
T02D1784b:293a-11: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni dbyer med par gyur pa rnal 'byor te /
T02D1784b:293a-12: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o //
T02D1784b:293a-13: gang zhig ces bya ba ni go sla ste zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:293a-14: thabs dang shes rab ni rig ma dang skyes bu dang /
T02D1784b:293a-15: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa na rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:293a-16: gang zhig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:293a-17: shes rab dang thabs ni padma dang rdo rje'o //
T02D1784b:293a-18: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni rnal 'byor te rgyu'o //
T02D1784b:293a-19: shes rab dang thabs ni h'um dang phat la sogs
T02D1784b:293a-20: pa dgod pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:293a-21: te las so // shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1784b:293a-22: bzhin gyi byang chub sems kyi thig le la snyoms
T02D1784b:293a-23: par 'jug pa ni rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa
T02D1784b:293a-25: shes rab ni dbang po rnams dang thabs ni yul rnams so //
T02D1784b:293a-26: de dag snyoms par 'jug cing longs spyod pa ni rnal 'byor te so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1784b:293a-27: shes rab ni dbang po rnams so ;
T02D1784b:293a-28: / thabs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1784b:293a-29: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni rnal 'byor te bsam gtan no //
T02D1784b:293a-30: shes rab ni don dam pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1784b:293a-31: thabs ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1784b:293a-32: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni rnal 'byor te /
T02D1784b:293a-33: de dag de dang 'og gi rim pas spro ba dang sdud pa ni srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02D1784b:293a-34: snga ma bzhin du shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1784b:293a-35: bzhin yungs kar gyi tshad tsam gyi thig le sna'i
T02D1784b:293a-36: rtse mo gsum la 'dzin pa ni snyoms par 'jug
T02D1784b:293b-0: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni lha mos 'khyud pa de bzhin @293b gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1784b:293b-1: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings
T02D1784b:293b-2: su spro ba ni rnal 'byor te rjes su dran
T02D1784b:293b-3: pa'o // shes rab dang thabs ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02D1784b:293b-4: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni sprul pa'i sku
T02D1784b:293b-5: dang lhan cig tu 'brel pa ni rnal 'byor te
T02D1784b:293b-7: shes rab ni sa bon lnga dang /
T02D1784b:293b-8: thabs ni bdud rtsi lnga ste /
T02D1784b:293b-9: de dag snyoms par 'jug pa ni de rnams kyis
T02D1784b:293b-10: de dag byin gyis brlabs pa'i bza' ba ni rnal
T02D1784b:293b-12: rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi don bstan par bya ste /
T02D1784b:293b-13: khyad par du tshig gi don bcu drug gtso bor
T02D1784b:293b-14: gyur pa'i ngag gi tshogs kyi rgyun gyis spras pas
T02D1784b:293b-15: na rgyun te / de nyid rgyud ces bya ba
T02D1784b:293b-16: ste tshig gi don bcu drug rgyas par byed pas
T02D1784b:293b-17: na rgyud de sgra'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid kyi bstan
T02D1784b:293b-19: de'i tshig ni don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:293b-20: rgyud de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02D1784b:293b-21: zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1784b:293b-22: gzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1784b:293b-23: gzhi zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dzin pas na thabs kyi rgyud de /
T02D1784b:293b-24: sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa rjod par byed pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02D1784b:293b-25: rang bzhin ni rgyu'i rgyud de gang du byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin med pa /
T02D1784b:293b-26: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:293b-27: mi 'phrogs pa ni 'jigs bar mi 'gyur ba 'bras bu'i rgyud yin te /
T02D1784b:293b-28: gang du bskyed pa'i rim pa'am /
T02D1784b:293b-29: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'am /
T02D1784b:293b-30: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'am /
T02D1784b:293b-31: yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i skur bstan to //
T02D1784b:293b-32: rgyud kyi dbye ba gsum ni de dag yin no //
T02D1784b:293b-33: dpal rdo rje 'chang yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1784b:293b-37: de la rgyu rdo rje 'chang ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1784b:293b-39: 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang ni de las byung zhing
T02D1784b:293b-40: de la rjes su zhugs pa las byung ba ma
T02D1784b:293b-41: bskyed pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1784b:293b-42: so // thabs kyi rdo rje 'chang ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1784b:294a-0: de la gnas bsrung ba ni khro bo bcu @294a * //
T02D1784b:294a-2: bdag bsrung ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa 'ba' zhig sgom pa ste /
T02D1784b:294a-3: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:294a-4: sngags rjes su dran pas stong pa nyid la 'jug
T02D1784b:294a-6: rnal 'byor bsrung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1784b:294a-7: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1784b:294a-8: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1784b:294a-9: de la bsod rnams kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid ni
T02D1784b:294a-10: snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas
T02D1784b:294a-11: bzhi stong pa'o // ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgom pa'o //
T02D1784b:294a-12: de ni thabs kyi rdo rje 'chang zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:294a-13: rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:294a-14: gzhi ni stong pa dang de'i sngags te de ni rgyu yin te /
T02D1784b:294a-15: rang bzhin dang ngo bo zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:294a-17: bu ram mngar nyid me yi ni //
T02D1784b:294a-18: tsha ba ji ltar rang bzhin te //
T02D1784b:294a-19: stong pa nyid ni chos kun gyi //
T02D1784b:294a-20: de bzhin rang bzhin nyid du 'dod //
T02D1784b:294a-23: chos dbyings tha mi dad pa'i phyir //
T02D1784b:294a-24: rigs kyi dbye ba mi rigs te //
T02D1784b:294a-25: rten pa'i chos kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1784b:294a-26: de yi dbye ba rab tu grags //
T02D1784b:294a-28: de bzhin du mi 'phrogs pa ni mi 'jigs pa ste /
T02D1784b:294a-29: rang bzhin gyis rtag pa chos kyi sku dang /
T02D1784b:294a-30: mi 'jigs pa'i rtag pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1784b:294a-31: rgyun gyi rtag pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D1784b:294a-32: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i
T02D1784b:294a-33: bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo mi 'phrogs
T02D1784b:294a-34: pa ste / 'jigs pa'i dang tshul ma yin pa 'bras bu zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:294a-35: gzhi ni rgyu dang 'bras bu thabs kyi ngo bos 'dzin cing 'jog par byed pas na gzhi'o //
T02D1784b:294a-36: sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa sgom pa'i rim pa
T02D1784b:294a-37: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya chen po thob
T02D1784b:294a-38: par bya ba'i phyir gang sgom pa de ni thabs
T02D1784b:294a-39: so // gsum pa de dag gi rgyud don gyis bsdus la /
T02D1784b:294a-40: rgyud ni sgra'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid dang don des brjod par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang bsdus te /
T02D1784b:294a-41: rnam pa gsum gyis don bsdus par shes par bya'o //
T02D1784b:294a-42: de ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1784b:294a-43: rigs lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1784b:294a-44: de kho na nyid la sogs pa mdor bstan par bya'o //
T02D1784b:294b-0: byang chub rdo rje ni bcom ldan @294b 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D1784b:294b-2: de nyid rnam pa lnga ru ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid khams gsum pa ste /
T02D1784b:294b-3: de ni rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:294b-4: de'i rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1784b:294b-5: bskyed pa'i rim pa kho na'o //
T02D1784b:294b-6: rnam par shes pa lnga'i bdag nyid dag pa'i ngo
T02D1784b:294b-7: bo me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes
T02D1784b:294b-8: lnga'i bdag nyid de kho na nyid de rdzogs pa'i
T02D1784b:294b-9: rim pa'o // mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa
T02D1784b:294b-10: lnga la sogs pa de kho na nyid de dang
T02D1784b:294b-13: las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:294b-14: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis ngag
T02D1784b:294b-15: dang sems dang lus dang kun rdzob dang gnyi ga
T02D1784b:294b-16: dag pa ni de kho na nyid lnga ste /
T02D1784b:294b-17: rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems la dmigs pa dang /
T02D1784b:294b-18: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1784b:294b-19: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1784b:294b-21: yul dang dbang po gcig tu byas na de kho na nyid lnga ste /
T02D1784b:294b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mos pa dang /
T02D1784b:294b-24: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang /
T02D1784b:294b-26: sems rtse gcig pa nyid de yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan ni de kho na nyid lnga ste /
T02D1784b:294b-28: srog la sogs pa rlung lnga thig le'i gzugs su spro ba ni de kho na nyid lnga ste /
T02D1784b:294b-30: phung po lnga'i snying por gyur pa'i thig le padma'i
T02D1784b:294b-31: lte bar 'dzin pa ni de kho na nyid lnga
T02D1784b:294b-32: ste 'dzin pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang
T02D1784b:294b-33: bzhin sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spro ba
T02D1784b:294b-34: ni de kho na nyid lnga ste rjes su dran
T02D1784b:294b-35: ste 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // sku lnga dang spyan
T02D1784b:294b-36: lnga dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes
T02D1784b:294b-38: pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod par mdzad pa
T02D1784b:294b-39: ste 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // lnga dang / dang
T02D1784b:294b-40: / 'gro ba lnga rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa
T02D1784b:294b-41: ste 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // lnga dang / dang
T02D1784b:294b-42: / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1784b:294b-43: 'byung ba chen po lnga'i ngo bo 'od zer lnga
T02D1784b:294b-44: ste 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // lnga dang / dang
T02D1784b:294b-45: / dang / spro ba dang / sdud par mdzad
T02D1784b:294b-46: pa rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya chen po'i sku
T02D1784b:294b-47: de kho na nyid lnga ste ting nge 'dzin no
T02D1784b:294b-48: ste 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // lnga dang / dang
T02D1784b:294b-49: / dang / spro ba dang / // de bzhin
T02D1784b:294b-50: gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin lcags kyu lnga dang bdud
T02D1784b:294b-51: rtsi lnga dang sa bon lngas byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1784b:294b-52: de kho na nyid lnga ste dam tshig go //
T02D1784b:295a-1: ldan pa'i slob pa blang ba ni de kho na nyid lnga ste sdom pa'o //
T02D1784b:295a-2: de ni sdom pa ste don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:295a-3: gsang ba gsum ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1784b:295a-4: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni gsang ba yin pas
T02D1784b:295a-5: na lhag pa'i lha ni rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1784b:295a-7: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir lhag pa yang yin la /
T02D1784b:295a-8: gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas na lhag pa yang yin te /
T02D1784b:295a-9: lhag pa'i lha ni yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam mam /
T02D1784b:295a-10: skra'i rtse mo'i brgya stong gi tshang tsam gyi thig le ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:295a-11: dam tshig ni phul du byung ba ste /
T02D1784b:295a-12: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdul bya'i sems
T02D1784b:295a-13: can gyi khams grol bar byed pas na rdo rje
T02D1784b:295a-14: 'chang gi rigs gcig yin na yang rnam pa brgyar
T02D1784b:295a-15: 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa re re la
T02D1784b:295a-16: lnga lnga la sogs par phye ba'i phyir ro zhes
T02D1784b:295a-18: de ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
T02D1784b:295a-19: sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba
T02D1784b:295a-20: rags pa dang phra ba'i bag chags kyi ngo bo
T02D1784b:295a-21: ji srid yod pa de srid rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1784b:295a-22: thabs su gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs bstan
T02D1784b:295a-23: to // de bas na gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mtshungs pa'i rigs yin te /
T02D1784b:295a-24: ji srid grangs med pa'i rigs yin pas rgya che ste /
T02D1784b:295a-26: byang chub kyi sems bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:295a-27: thog ma dang tha ma med pa rang bzhin gyis
T02D1784b:295a-28: rtag pa chos kyi sku'i ngo bo skye ba dang
T02D1784b:295a-29: 'jig pa dang bral ba de nyid kyi phyir kun
T02D1784b:295a-30: nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bag
T02D1784b:295a-31: chags kyi rtog pa dang dri ma zhi bas na
T02D1784b:295a-32: zhi ba'o// dngos po ni khams gsum gyi rang bzhin phung po lnga la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:295a-33: dngos med ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784b:295a-34: de dag zad pa ni de'i so sor snang ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D1784b:295a-35: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba ma lus pa'i gzhir
T02D1784b:295a-36: gyur pa sku gnyis po'i rgyur gyur pa yin pas
T02D1784b:295a-38: stong pa nyid ni thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D1784b:295a-39: snying rje ni thugs rje chen po'o //
T02D1784b:295a-40: de dag dbyer med pa gcig tu gyur pa ste /
T02D1784b:295a-41: byang chub kyi rang bzhin sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo /
T02D1784b:295a-42: sems ni mchog tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid
T02D1784b:295a-43: rnam 'byor gyis mngon sum gyis myong ba byang chub
T02D1784b:295b-0: kyi sems zhes bya ba @295b ste rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1784b:295b-1: pa'o // yang na thog ma ni snang ba dang snang mched pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-2: tha ma ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-3: de med pa ni zhib ste 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1784b:295b-4: dngos po ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:295b-5: dngos med ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:295b-6: 'od gsal bas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1784b:295b-7: / dngos dang dngos med kyi rang bzhin de zad bas na zad pa ste thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-8: byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub ste 'od gsal
T02D1784b:295b-9: ba la zhugs pa'i sems ni rnam par shes pa
T02D1784b:295b-10: gsum ste / byang chub kyi sems ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1784b:295b-11: de ni sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-12: yang na thog ma ni chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1784b:295b-13: tha ma ni chags pa bar pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-14: de dang bral bas ni thog ma tha ma med pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-15: zhi ba ni rang rig pa ste chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1784b:295b-16: dngos po ni mtshams dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo'o //
T02D1784b:295b-17: dngos med ni smig rgyu la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga ste /
T02D1784b:295b-18: de dag zad cing thob pas na dngos dang dngos med zad pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-19: 'bras bur gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
T02D1784b:295b-20: stong nyid ni shes rab dang /
T02D1784b:295b-21: snying rje ni thabs te dag mi phyed pa ni
T02D1784b:295b-22: snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis thob pa'i byang chub
T02D1784b:295b-23: ni mngon par byang chub pa ste /
T02D1784b:295b-24: de'i rang bzhin gyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:295b-25: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-26: yang na rgyun gyis zhugs pas na thog ma tha ma med pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-27: sems rtse gcig pa nyid du skyed par byed pas na zhi ba'o //
T02D1784b:295b-28: dngos dang dngos med ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten te /
T02D1784b:295b-29: de'i rang bzhin yin yang sgom par gyur pas na /
T02D1784b:295b-30: de'i rnam par rtog pa zad pas na dngos dang dngos med zad pa'o //
T02D1784b:295b-31: khams gsum bskyed pas na gtso bo'o //
T02D1784b:295b-32: stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje ni kun rdzob kyi gzugs te /
T02D1784b:295b-33: mi phyed pa ni de dag dbyer med pa'i kun
T02D1784b:295b-34: rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa byang chub
T02D1784b:295b-35: kyi sems zhes bya ba ste 'bras bu'o //
T02D1784b:295b-36: yang na byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ni
T02D1784b:295b-37: gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1784b:295b-39: ji skad du sems bskyed pa ni gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1784b:295b-40: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T02D1784b:296a-2: smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1784b:296a-3: 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1784b:296a-4: de la sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can gyi
T02D1784b:296a-5: don bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i blo dang
T02D1784b:296a-6: snying rje dag gis zab pa dang /
T02D1784b:296a-7: rgya che ba don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de ni smon ba byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1784b:296a-8: byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par len pa
T02D1784b:296a-9: la sogs pa la 'jug pa ni 'jug pa byang
T02D1784b:296a-10: chub kyi sems te gnyis so //
T02D1784b:296a-11: ji skad du sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las /
T02D1784b:296a-12: rigs kyi bu sems can de rnyed par dka' ste /
T02D1784b:296a-13: gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1784b:296a-14: pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa dang
T02D1784b:296a-15: / gang zhig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1784b:296a-16: tu mngon par 'jug par bgyid pa de dag de
T02D1784b:296a-17: rnams las kyang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o zhes
T02D1784b:296a-18: / gsungs so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1784b:296a-19: gsungs pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbye
T02D1784b:296a-20: bas rnam pa mang por 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:296a-21: 'dir ni re zhig rnam pa bcu yin te /
T02D1784b:296a-22: byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon dang /
T02D1784b:296a-23: sdig pa bshags ba la sogs rnam pa bdun gyi mchod pa dang /
T02D1784b:296a-24: byang chub kyi sems blang ba dang /
T02D1784b:296a-25: bag med pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296a-26: de shes bzhin du bsrung ba dang /
T02D1784b:296a-31: yongs su bsngo ba ste bcu'o //
T02D1784b:296a-32: de ni rgya che ba ste bslab pa kun las btus pa las blta bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:296a-33: de bzhin du de yang rnam pa nyi shu gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:296a-36: de yang sa gser bla ba me //
T02D1784b:296a-37: gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho //
T02D1784b:296a-38: rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang //
T02D1784b:296a-39: yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu //
T02D1784b:296a-40: rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che //
T02D1784b:296a-41: bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni //
T02D1784b:296a-42: sgra snyan chu bo'i sprin rnams kyi //
T02D1784b:296a-43: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1784b:296a-44: de la 'di ltar blta bar bya ste /
T02D1784b:296a-45: 'dum pa'i skabs la dbye ba yis //
T02D1784b:296a-46: smon pa'i sems ni rnam pa gsum //
T02D1784b:296a-47: 'jug pa zhes bya'i sems rnams ni //
T02D1784b:296a-48: de yis sems la bcu dgu yin //
T02D1784b:296a-49: de la smon pa'i sems ni dbye ba rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1784b:296b-0: 'dun pa dang bcas pa ni chos thams cad @296b
T02D1784b:296b-1: mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid de sa
T02D1784b:296b-2: dang 'dra ba'o // bsam pa dang bcas pa ni
T02D1784b:296b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par 'dod
T02D1784b:296b-5: ma 'ongs pa dang 'di nyid du 'gyur ba la mi ba rten pas gser bzang po lta bu'o //
T02D1784b:296b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang bcas pa ni byang chub
T02D1784b:296b-7: kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos sgom par
T02D1784b:296b-9: dkar po'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bas 'gro bas na zla ba sar pa lta bu'o //
T02D1784b:296b-10: 'jug pa'i sems ni rnam pa bcu dgu ste /
T02D1784b:296b-11: sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-12: sbyin pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02D1784b:296b-13: mngon par shes pa dang bcas pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-14: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-15: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-16: gzungs dang spobs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-17: chos ston pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-18: theg pa gcig gi lam dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1784b:296b-19: chos kyi sku dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1784b:296b-20: de nas skabs ni bzhi po yis //
T02D1784b:296b-21: de dag thams cad khyab par byed //
T02D1784b:296b-22: 'bras bu rgyu dang sbyor sogs dang //
T02D1784b:296b-23: las kyi dang po'i dbye bas so //
T02D1784b:296b-24: de la gsum gyis ni las dang po'i skabs dang /
T02D1784b:296b-26: nges par 'byed pa'i cha'i skabs so//
T02D1784b:296b-27: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i sems kyis rgyu'i skabs so //
T02D1784b:296b-28: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i sems brgyad kyis 'bras bu'i skabs so //
T02D1784b:296b-29: smon pa'i rnam pa dang por ni //
T02D1784b:296b-30: de la mgon pos yang dag gsungs //
T02D1784b:296b-31: sbyin sogs 'jug pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02D1784b:296b-32: gnyis par yongs su grags pa yin //
T02D1784b:296b-33: 'dun pa'i rnam pa smon pa'i sems ni rnam pa gsum du bshad do //
T02D1784b:296b-34: gang nas brtsams te sdom pa blangs pa sngon du
T02D1784b:296b-35: 'gro bas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs la 'jug
T02D1784b:296b-36: pa'i sems so // sdom pa yang sdom pa dang
T02D1784b:296b-37: mkhas pa dang stobs dang ldan pa'i slob dpon las
T02D1784b:296b-38: pa'i sems so // blang bar bya'o // de mi
T02D1784b:296b-39: bzhugs na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mdun
T02D1784b:296b-40: du gnas par yid kyis dmigs pa las blang bar
T02D1784b:296b-41: pa'i sems so // blang bar bya'o // bya'o // de yang /
T02D1784b:296b-42: thabs med par ni shes rab med //
T02D1784b:296b-43: sbyin sogs shes rab med pas min //
T02D1784b:296b-44: gzhan yang zhi gnas bskyed byas nas //
T02D1784b:297a-3: shes rab med pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pas ni /
T02D1784b:297a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1784b:297a-6: de bas na shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1784b:297a-7: zhi gnas bskyed pa la 'bad rtsol bya'o //
T02D1784b:297a-8: gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan sdug bsngal bzod pa dang //
T02D1784b:297a-9: gang zhig brtson 'grus dang ldan brtan pa bag dang bcas //
T02D1784b:297a-10: yang dag rab tu sbyor zhing gang tshe de dang ni //
T02D1784b:297a-11: de yi ting nge 'dzin du myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D1784b:297a-12: tshul khrims la sogs pa gsum dang zhi gnas kyi tshogs la gnas shing /
T02D1784b:297a-13: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su lus
T02D1784b:297a-14: po drang por byas la stan 'jam pa la 'dug
T02D1784b:297a-15: ste / snying rje chen po sngon du byas nas
T02D1784b:297a-16: sems can thams cad gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
T02D1784b:297a-17: pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi
T02D1784b:297a-19: byang chub kyi sems kyi mdor bsdus pa'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1784b:297a-20: stong pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:297a-21: snying rje ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1784b:297a-22: de dag mi phyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:297a-23: gang gi phyir shes rab med pas byang chub sems
T02D1784b:297a-24: dpa' la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
T02D1784b:297a-26: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i shes rab ni ma yin te /
T02D1784b:297a-27: chad pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:297a-28: de bas na stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha
T02D1784b:297a-29: mi dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems la dmigs te
T02D1784b:297a-30: / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang dngos
T02D1784b:297a-31: po dang dngos po med pa dang bral ba chos
T02D1784b:297a-32: kyi sku sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1784b:297a-33: pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:297a-34: rig pa'i skyes bu'i 'dri ba'i lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir sku zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1784b:297a-35: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1784b:297a-36: mi phyed pa'i ngo bo ni de la rjes su zhugs shing gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:297a-37: phyed pa'i ngo bo ni tha dad par snang pa'o //
T02D1784b:297a-38: rig pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu ldan pa ni 'khyud pa /
T02D1784b:297a-39: skyes bu ni sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku ste /
T02D1784b:297a-40: de ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do //
T02D1784b:297a-42: rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs gyur nas /
T02D1784b:297b-0: @297b thugs rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rim pa
T02D1784b:297b-1: gnyis kyis bsgom par bya ba ni rig pa'i skyes
T02D1784b:297b-4: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02D1784b:297b-5: phyung ba'i sngags bcu gsum gyi don bshad de /
T02D1784b:297b-6: lnga 'dzom pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa
T02D1784b:297b-7: nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa lnga 'og gi rtse
T02D1784b:297b-8: mo lnga'i rang bzhin dang de bzhin du steng gi
T02D1784b:297b-9: rtse mo lnga ni me long lta bu la sogs
T02D1784b:297b-10: pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:297b-11: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i tshul du gnas pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:297b-12: gang gi phyir lnga 'dzom pa ni spong ba dang lnga rig pa ni shes pa dang /
T02D1784b:297b-13: ba dang dzra yi ge gnyis kyi don gyis rdo rje ste /
T02D1784b:297b-14: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'chang ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-15: yang na rtsa lnga bha ga'i nang du chud pa de rnams tha dad par spong pa dang /
T02D1784b:297b-16: rig pa ni bde ba chen po rtogs pas na rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
T02D1784b:297b-17: de 'dzin pa'i las su rung ba nyid kyi 'chang ba /
T02D1784b:297b-18: rnam shes yid ni byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:297b-19: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu'o //
T02D1784b:297b-20: yod ces bya ba la sogs pa la dbang phyug
T02D1784b:297b-21: dam pas sprul pa dngos po rnams yod do zhes
T02D1784b:297b-22: dbang phyug tu smra ba pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-23: dus gsum yongs su 'gyur ba dngos po yod do zhes grangs can pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-24: bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa yod do zhes rigs pa pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-25: tshangs pa'i rang bzhin dngos po yod do zhes dpyod pa pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-26: zho yang snga mor 'gyur ro zhes 'gyur bar smra ba ni gcer bu pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-27: dus kyi sems can smin par 'gyur ro zhes dus su smra ba pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-28: yang dang yang du skye zhing yang dang yang du zag pas na gang zag ste /
T02D1784b:297b-29: de'i rang bzhin dngos po yod do zhes gang zag tu smra ba pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-30: sgra ni tshangs pa dam pa de'i rang bzhin dngos po thams cad yod do zhes pa ste /
T02D1784b:297b-32: nus pa gcig pus 'di dag thams cad spro zhing sdud pas na /
T02D1784b:297b-33: de'i rang bzhin dngos po thams cad yod ces nus pa pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-34: 'dus byas pa thams cad ni rtag pa dang /
T02D1784b:297b-38: bye brag tu smra ba pa'o //
T02D1784b:297b-39: rnam par rig pa yod kyi dngos po ni med do zhes rang sangs rgyas pa'i'o //
T02D1784b:298a-0: phyi rol gyi rnam pa dang bral ba sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs @298a * //
T02D1784b:298a-1: pa rnam par rig pa nyid sna tshogs yin no zhes rnam par dpyod pa pa'o //
T02D1784b:298a-2: gzung ba ni 'dzin pa dang gcig dang du ma
T02D1784b:298a-3: dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa yin no zhes dbu
T02D1784b:298a-4: ma pa ste / de dag thams cad yod pa nyid du smra ba pa'o //
T02D1784b:298a-5: med par smra ba ni ji ltar 'tsho bas bde ba 'tsho //
T02D1784b:298a-7: thal bar gyur pa shi ba ni //
T02D1784b:298a-8: slar 'od ba ni ga la yod //
T02D1784b:298a-10: 'byung ba shes par bya ba ni 'jig rten rgyang pa na ba'o //
T02D1784b:298a-11: yod pa dang med pa de dag dbus ni gnyis
T02D1784b:298a-12: ka'i tsha'i rang bzhin las 'das pa ni bral ba
T02D1784b:298a-13: ste me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1784b:298a-14: 'byung ba ni khams phra ba sa la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1784b:298a-15: 'byung ba las gyur pa ni de rnams kyi byas par rigs pa'o //
T02D1784b:298a-16: de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste de'i rang
T02D1784b:298a-17: bzhin rnam par dag pa ni rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1784b:298a-18: rang bzhin no // sems can kun gyi lus yin te //
T02D1784b:298a-19: zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'dzin cing 'ching bas na lus ni gti mug ste /
T02D1784b:298a-20: de kho na nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa ste /
T02D1784b:298a-21: sems can las rgyal bas rgyal te /
T02D1784b:298a-22: de las kyang rgyal zhing zil gyis gnon pas na dzi na dzi ka ste /
T02D1784b:298a-23: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad de rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:298a-24: re zhig sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D1784b:298a-25: yin pas na rin chen dang 'dra bas na rin
T02D1784b:298a-26: chen te / de nyid nam mkha'i khams rnam par
T02D1784b:298a-27: dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1784b:298a-28: chen te / / don kun ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rim pas 'byung ba ste skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1784b:298a-29: de bas na tshor bya dang tshor byed dang tshor
T02D1784b:298a-30: ba'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par shes pa dag par
T02D1784b:298a-31: byed pas na de nyid rin chen te /
T02D1784b:298a-32: de dang 'dra ba'i rin chen 'dzin pas na /
T02D1784b:298a-34: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:298a-35: thun mong ma yin pa de kho na nyid la
T02D1784b:298a-36: rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i chos ni mtshan nyid
T02D1784b:298a-37: de / dper na lto ba che ba'i bum pa bzhin no //
T02D1784b:298a-38: de 'dzin par byed pa'i bdag nyid ni 'du shes so //
T02D1784b:298a-39: de'i yul ni bum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1784b:298a-40: gang gi mtshon pa de ni bya ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1784b:298a-41: gsum po'i bdag nyid 'du shes kyi phung po de rnam par dag par byed pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1784b:298a-42: de bzhin du kun ni me'i khams so //
T02D1784b:298b-0: kun gyis ni khyab par byed @298b pa so sor
T02D1784b:298b-1: rtog pa'i ye shes dag par byed pas na dngos
T02D1784b:298b-2: po'o // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ni bud med kyi mtshan pa /
T02D1784b:298b-3: mtshan gzhi ni dmigs shing skye ba ste /
T02D1784b:298b-5: ye shes de nyid kyis de la rgyal par byed pas na a'a ro li ka ste /
T02D1784b:298b-6: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:298b-7: rnam par shes rab mthar phyin ni bya ba nan
T02D1784b:298b-8: tan sgrub pa'i rang bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa
T02D1784b:298b-9: de nyid phrag dog gi nyon mongs pa 'joms par
T02D1784b:298b-10: byed pas na shes rab ces bya'o //
T02D1784b:298b-11: de bas na 'du byed sems pa ni 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1784b:298b-12: 'dzin pa ni rlung gi khams rnam par dag par
T02D1784b:298b-13: byed pas ye shes de nyid pradzny'a dhri ka ste
T02D1784b:298b-14: / don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:298b-15: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:298b-16: rigs ni rgyud de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga'i rgyud do //
T02D1784b:298b-17: rgyud ni thog ma ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1784b:298b-18: mi 'jigs skye ba med pa ni mgon po de nyid de /
T02D1784b:298b-19: de nyid kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1784b:298b-20: spong ba'i rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1784b:298b-21: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa
T02D1784b:298b-22: rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi zhe sdang
T02D1784b:298b-23: rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1784b:298b-24: shes dang mi bskyod par bshad do //
T02D1784b:298b-25: de bzhin du gzugs dang nyon mongs pa gti mug
T02D1784b:298b-26: dang bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin ni sa'i khams
T02D1784b:298b-27: te / de rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1784b:298b-28: tshor ba'i phung po dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa
T02D1784b:298b-29: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang
T02D1784b:298b-30: bzhin ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1784b:298b-31: 'du shes kyi phung po dang dngos po la chags pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02D1784b:298b-32: me'i khams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1784b:298b-33: 'du byed dang phrag dog dang rkyen gyis drangs pa'i
T02D1784b:298b-34: rang bzhin ni rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa
T02D1784b:298b-36: de dang 'dra ba byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo
T02D1784b:298b-37: bo nyid ni srid pa kun 'byung thams cad de
T02D1784b:298b-38: / skye ba po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02D1784b:298b-39: rigs bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags zhe sdang
T02D1784b:298b-40: nyon mongs ldan pa ni de'i lhan cig byed pa'i
T02D1784b:299a-0: rgyu @299a * // las skyes pang rgyal lam dregs pa gzhom par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1784b:299a-1: nor gyi dregs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1784b:299a-2: kyi nga rgyal gzhom par bya ba'i phyir nor bu'i
T02D1784b:299a-3: rigs te / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po
T02D1784b:299a-4: che'i char gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
T02D1784b:299a-5: par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs zhes
T02D1784b:299a-7: dam tshig gi rigs zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba
T02D1784b:299a-8: sna tshogs kyi las las skyes pa'i 'bras bu 'dra
T02D1784b:299a-9: ba ste / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D1784b:299a-10: pa'i mtshan nyid dam tshig dang sdom pa sbyin pas
T02D1784b:299a-11: 'joms pas na dam tshig gi rigs ni don yod
T02D1784b:299a-13: de bzhin du gnyis med ye shes ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi chos te /
T02D1784b:299a-14: de'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po'i nga rgyal byed pa ni khyab par byed pa rmongs pa ste /
T02D1784b:299a-15: de la chags pa'i rang bzhin ni gti mug gi rigs zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:299a-16: de la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de la
T02D1784b:299a-17: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pas phan tshun 'byer
T02D1784b:299a-18: ba ni zhe sdang dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1784b:299a-19: shes gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i tshul gyis bzhag
T02D1784b:299a-20: pa gang yin pa de ni zhe sdang ste /
T02D1784b:299a-21: zhe sdang gi rigs zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:299a-22: 'jig rten pa'i chags pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod chags
T02D1784b:299a-23: gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi thabs kyis
T02D1784b:299a-24: sbyor bar mdzad pas na 'dod chags kyi rigs so
T02D1784b:299a-25: // gti mug la sogs pa'i rigs de rnams nyon
T02D1784b:299a-26: mongs pa rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rang
T02D1784b:299a-27: bzhin la dga' ba gang la yod pa de ni
T02D1784b:299a-28: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa ste don dam
T02D1784b:299a-29: // pa'i phyogs so // kun rdzob ni bud med
T02D1784b:299a-30: ni rang bzhin gyis gzugs la dmigs shing 'dod chags
T02D1784b:299a-31: kyi rigs can gyi sems can gdon pa'i thabs kyis
T02D1784b:299a-32: gti mug la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang
T02D1784b:299a-33: bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:299a-34: yang dag par sbyor zhing bde ba nyams su myong
T02D1784b:299a-35: bar byed ba spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo ni
T02D1784b:299a-36: gti mug dga' ma la sogs par bshad do //
T02D1784b:299a-37: de ltar na nyon mongs pa gsum dang /
T02D1784b:299a-38: de bzhin du rdo rje ste phrag dog dang de dag rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1784b:299a-39: dga' ma ni spyan la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1784b:299a-40: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni sems can thams
T02D1784b:299b-0: cad de @299b sems can thams cad gdul bar bya
T02D1784b:299b-2: de nyid rdo rje theg pa ste rgyun ma chad
T02D1784b:299b-3: pa'i sems can gyi don rdzogs par byed pa la
T02D1784b:299b-4: ma yin no zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:299b-5: sgo srung rnam par dag par bya ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:299b-6: mi 'jig pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:299b-7: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:299b-8: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:299b-9: de'i rang bzhin yongs su ma shes pa ni gshin rje ste /
T02D1784b:299b-10: de'i dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ni de dag
T02D1784b:299b-11: mthar byed pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i
T02D1784b:299b-12: sgo'i rang bzhin ni gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:299b-13: de bzhin du rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni
T02D1784b:299b-14: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan dang bral ba
T02D1784b:299b-15: / don dam mi 'gyur dag 'gyur nyid ni mtshan
T02D1784b:299b-16: ma med pa'i rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin
T02D1784b:299b-17: / no // sems kun gyi ni dam tshig sti //
T02D1784b:299b-18: de mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab ste /
T02D1784b:299b-19: de mthar byed pas na shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:299b-20: smon pa med pa'i phyir bstan du med pas na brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid ngo //
T02D1784b:299b-21: de nyid kyi phyir sngar bshad pa'i rig pas ming
T02D1784b:299b-22: dang gzugs blo dngos po med pa ni 'du byed
T02D1784b:299b-23: kyi phung po la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1784b:299b-24: de rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pas na bems po yin pas na padma'o //
T02D1784b:299b-25: chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni smon pa med
T02D1784b:299b-26: pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin ni padma
T02D1784b:299b-27: mthar byed do // mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i
T02D1784b:299b-28: rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D1784b:299b-29: mthar byed do // bdag nyid dang / rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i chos thams cad ngo //
T02D1784b:299b-30: de'i rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pa ni bgegs so //
T02D1784b:299b-31: de dag mthar byed pas na mngon par 'du sam
T02D1784b:299b-32: byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin ni
T02D1784b:299b-34: mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas stong
T02D1784b:299b-35: pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sog
T02D1784b:299b-36: bzhi'i nye bar bsdus pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o
T02D1784b:299b-37: // gti mug ni ma dad pa'o //
T02D1784b:299b-38: de'i longs spyod ni spong bar byed pa ma dad pa'o //
T02D1784b:299b-39: gti mug ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba'o //
T02D1784b:300a-0: de zad par byed pa ste de bzhin @300a * //
T02D1784b:300a-1: du lus ni phung po'i bdud do //
T02D1784b:300a-2: shes bya ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D1784b:300a-3: de dag 'khor ba rnams gsod par byed pas na gshin rje'o //
T02D1784b:300a-4: de dag dang pas mthar byed pas na gshin rje mthar byed pa'o //
T02D1784b:300a-5: nyes pa ni mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D1784b:300a-6: nyes pa longs spyod ni de rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1784b:300a-7: nyes pa ni dge ba'i las le lo ste /
T02D1784b:300a-8: de la shes rab ni brtson 'grus kyi mthar byed pas na shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-9: de bas na mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnam par dag pas zhe sdang mthar byed kyang yin la /
T02D1784b:300a-10: le lo rnam par dag pas shes rab mthar byed yin no //
T02D1784b:300a-11: sems ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud de /
T02D1784b:300a-12: de rnam par dag pas na sems mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-13: nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D1784b:300a-14: de rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-15: de bas na brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-17: yang 'dod chags ni 'chi bdag gi bdud do //
T02D1784b:300a-18: de dag zad pa ni padma mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-19: yang 'dod chags ni log pa'i lta ba ste /
T02D1784b:300a-20: de mthar byed pas ni chags pa mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-21: snyoms 'jug ni srid pa gzhan la 'pho ba ste /
T02D1784b:300a-23: de rnam par dag pas na snyoms 'jug mthar byed ni dran pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:300a-25: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa thams
T02D1784b:300a-26: cad kyi rgyur gyur pas na rnam par g-yeng ba'o
T02D1784b:300a-27: // sems can thams cad rlag par byed pas na
T02D1784b:300a-28: rdo rje ste rdo rje dang 'dra bas lha'i bu'i
T02D1784b:300a-29: // bdud do // sgrib pa ni las kyi sgrib
T02D1784b:300a-30: pa dang kun ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa
T02D1784b:300a-31: // bdud do // ste / de rnam par dag par byed pas na bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300a-32: rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:300a-33: nyon mongs pa ni ma dag pa la sogs pa de rnams brtan pas na rje'o //
T02D1784b:300a-34: de rnams kyi sgrib pa'i sems gang yin pa de
T02D1784b:300a-35: rnam par dag par gyur na las thams cad ni
T02D1784b:300a-36: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam par dag
T02D1784b:300a-37: par 'gyur ro // las rnam par dag par gyur
T02D1784b:300a-38: na rnal 'byor ba'i 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'chang
T02D1784b:300a-39: chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i mtshan nyid dag pa
T02D1784b:300a-40: chos kyi sku rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1784b:300a-41: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1784b:300b-0: de bas na don bsdus pa @300b ni 'di yin te /
T02D1784b:300b-1: ma dad pa phung po'i bdud dang 'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ste /
T02D1784b:300b-2: 'di dag 'joms pa dad pa'i rang bzhin ni gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300b-3: le lo dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1784b:300b-4: lta ba dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ste 'di
T02D1784b:300b-5: dag 'joms pas brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin shes rab
T02D1784b:300b-6: mthar byed do // brjed ngas pa dang 'chi bdag
T02D1784b:300b-7: gi bdud dang log par lta ba dang skye ba'i
T02D1784b:300b-8: mthar byed do // sgrib pa ste / 'di dag
T02D1784b:300b-9: spong bas na dran pa'i gzhi ste padma mthar byed
T02D1784b:300b-10: mthar byed do // sgrib pa ste / do // rnam par g-yeng ba dang lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
T02D1784b:300b-11: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang las kyi sgrib pa ste /
T02D1784b:300b-12: 'di dag rnam par dag pas ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin ni bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1784b:300b-13: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:300b-14: gtsug tor la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:300b-15: 'dis gzung bas na gzung ba'i dbang po'o //
T02D1784b:300b-16: chags ba ni chags ba bskyed pa ste yul lo //
T02D1784b:300b-17: rnam pa ni yid la byed pa'o //
T02D1784b:300b-18: mi g-yo ba ni gang gi dbang gis rnam par
T02D1784b:300b-19: shes pa gnod pa med pas don 'dzin pa de
T02D1784b:300b-20: ni snang ba'o // mig dang gzugs dang snang ba
T02D1784b:300b-21: dang yid la byed pa bzhi po de dag ni
T02D1784b:300b-22: nye bar len pa dang lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i
T02D1784b:300b-24: gang zhig 'das ma thag tu byung ba mig gi
T02D1784b:300b-25: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa skad cig ma
T02D1784b:300b-26: de snga ma'i skad cig ma ni rgyu'o //
T02D1784b:300b-27: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'bras bu ste /
T02D1784b:300b-28: rgyu drug las sems yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
T02D1784b:300b-29: yang na mig la sogs pa nas yid kyi skye
T02D1784b:300b-30: mched kyi bar du dbang po rnams las sems yang
T02D1784b:300b-32: rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang //
T02D1784b:300b-33: rnam par smin dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1784b:300b-34: kun 'gro skal mnyam dang bcas pa //
T02D1784b:300b-35: rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu bshad //
T02D1784b:300b-36: ces bya ba drug po de dag las sems yang dag par 'byung ba'o //
T02D1784b:300b-37: de'i rnam par dag pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po
T02D1784b:300b-38: nas gtsug tor gyi bar du khro bo drug bshad
T02D1784b:300b-39: pa'o // de ni rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1784b:300b-40: khro bo zhe sdang rigs las byung //
T02D1784b:300b-42: dam tshig rdo rje la sogs pa drug ni le'u
T02D1784b:300b-43: dang po las bshad pa'i rigs pas sgrib pa thams
T02D1784b:301a-0: cad sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems @301a
T02D1784b:301a-2: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga dang /
T02D1784b:301a-3: sa 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i rang
T02D1784b:301a-4: bzhin gyis rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas pa
T02D1784b:301a-5: ste / 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1784b:301a-6: byams pa dang kun du bzang po ni rtsa rgyus
T02D1784b:301a-7: thams cad dang tshigs thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1784b:301a-8: rang bzhin no // gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa ni lha mo drug ste /
T02D1784b:301a-9: gzugs kyi skye mched la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1784b:301a-10: de bas na rig pa ni gzugs rdo rje ma
T02D1784b:301a-11: la sogs pa'i rgyal po ni rig pa'i rgyal po
T02D1784b:301a-12: ste / byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D1784b:301a-13: rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D1784b:301a-14: de dag gi bdag po gang gi gtso bor gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i bdag po ste /
T02D1784b:301a-15: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bshad do //
T02D1784b:301a-16: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:301a-17: kun du spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:301a-18: sku la sogs pa dang phung po la sogs pa
T02D1784b:301a-19: thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba ye shes kyi
T02D1784b:301a-20: phyag rgya dang gnyis su med par snyoms par 'jug
T02D1784b:301a-22: cig car du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs dang
T02D1784b:301a-23: ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'gro ba 'di dag thams
T02D1784b:301a-24: cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes mos par byas
T02D1784b:301a-25: la / 'jigs pa thams cad ni skye ba dang
T02D1784b:301a-26: 'jig pa la sogs ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang
T02D1784b:301a-27: bral ba ni spangs pa ste //
T02D1784b:301a-28: seng ge bzhin du dogs pa med bar bza' ba
T02D1784b:301a-29: dang bza' ba ma yin pa la sogs pa'i rnam
T02D1784b:301a-30: par rtog pa dang bral ba ci snyed pa za
T02D1784b:301a-31: ba'am bsam gtan gyis zas za ba can mnyam par
T02D1784b:301a-32: ma bzhag pa ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhi por
T02D1784b:301a-33: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis thams cad kyi rang
T02D1784b:301a-34: bzhin du mthong bas rtag tu ni dus thams cad
T02D1784b:301a-35: du mnyam par 'jog cing sems kun ni zag pa
T02D1784b:301a-36: thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis spyod pa gang
T02D1784b:301a-37: yin pa de ni kun du spyod pa zhes bya
T02D1784b:301a-38: ste / shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:301a-39: sngags kyi spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:301a-40: dbang po yul rnams ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pas rten cing blangs na /
T02D1784b:301a-41: yid ni bde ba'i rang bzhin ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:301b-0: de mi mthun pa'i yid la byed pa nus par byed @301b ba dang /
T02D1784b:301b-1: de kho na nyid srung bar byed pas skyob pas na sngags te /
T02D1784b:301b-2: shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pa las byung ba bde ba'o //
T02D1784b:301b-3: de la dmigs nas 'jig rten spyod pa ni tha
T02D1784b:301b-4: mal pa'i lus rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba
T02D1784b:301b-5: / lha'i skur bsgoms ba blangs nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar spyod pa'am /
T02D1784b:301b-6: gnas 'tshal du slong mo slong bas kun du bzang
T02D1784b:301b-7: po'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa
T02D1784b:301b-8: gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi spyod pa zhes
T02D1784b:301b-10: de ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1784b:301b-11: bzlas pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:301b-12: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni 'jug pa dang gnas
T02D1784b:301b-13: pa dang ldang ba'i rim gyis yin na tshig spangs
T02D1784b:301b-14: pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po rnam par bsam
T02D1784b:301b-15: pa ni don rtogs pa'i rnam par bsams nas so
T02D1784b:301b-16: // spro dang bsdu ba ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang bas so //
T02D1784b:301b-17: sngags ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02D1784b:301b-18: de'i zlos pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1784b:301b-19: de'i dbye bas ni steng dang logs dang dad po dang 'og gi dbye bas so //
T02D1784b:301b-20: zlos pas byed pa ni zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi rigs pas slob pa'o //
T02D1784b:301b-21: de ltar yi ge gsum gyis rim gyis bzlas pa bshad do //
T02D1784b:301b-22: sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag ni me long
T02D1784b:301b-23: lta bu la sogs pa ye shes rang bzhin de
T02D1784b:301b-25: de dag ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu //
T02D1784b:301b-26: zhes pa ni yi ge aom gyi nang du bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1784b:301b-27: byang chub bdag med ni so sor rtog pa'i ye
T02D1784b:301b-28: shes kyi rang bzhin 'od dpag tu med pa'i sa
T02D1784b:301b-30: bdag med ni de'i rigs can de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsgoms nas de'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1784b:301b-31: de bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spros te /
T02D1784b:301b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du
T02D1784b:301b-33: gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i rigs
T02D1784b:301b-34: can gyi yi ge h'um gis spro ba bya ste
T02D1784b:301b-35: / de ni rdo rje bzlas pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:301b-36: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:301b-37: ngag gi bzlas pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:301b-38: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams thams
T02D1784b:301b-39: cad la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1784b:301b-40: la gson cig ces bya bar mos pas ngag kun
T02D1784b:301b-41: bzlas pa ni sbrul la sogs pa'i sngags khro bo'i
T02D1784b:302a-1: bzlas pa gang yin pa de ni bzlas pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:302a-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1784b:302a-5: de bzhin du de nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1784b:302a-6: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no
T02D1784b:302a-7: // de'i bskul ba ni de'i dbye ba la brten
T02D1784b:302a-8: cing aom la sogs pa smra ba rdo rje bzlas
T02D1784b:302a-9: pa smra ba bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:302a-10: de nas rgyas gdab pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:302a-11: de ni rgyas gdab pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1784b:302a-12: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'i rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1784b:302a-13: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1784b:302a-14: dbang thob nas cod pan gyis rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1784b:302a-16: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:302a-17: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam
T02D1784b:302a-18: tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa de bzhin du thugs byin
T02D1784b:302a-19: gyis brlab pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i rgyas gdab
T02D1784b:302a-21: de'i thugs kar yang de dang 'dra ba'i sa bon
T02D1784b:302a-22: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rgyas gdab par
T02D1784b:302a-23: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
T02D1784b:302a-24: thob nas spyi bor sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D1784b:302a-25: dang 'dra ba'i cod pan du de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1784b:302a-27: de nas mchod pa'i dus su yang sems dpa' gsum
T02D1784b:302a-28: gyi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D1784b:302a-30: dkyil 'khor rgyal po dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:302a-31: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:302a-32: rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i //
T02D1784b:302a-33: zhes pa snang mdzad la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D1784b:302a-34: ba rig ma'i shes rab dang ldan pa rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:302a-35: pa ni sgrub pa pos bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:302a-36: de'i longs spyod bzhi ni ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02D1784b:302a-38: bstod pa dang mchod pa rgyas gdab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1784b:302a-39: bdag byin rlabs la sogs pa ni rang dang 'dra
T02D1784b:302a-40: bar ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa shes par
T02D1784b:302a-41: bya'o // de ni dkyil 'khor dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:302a-42: spyir bshad cing khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:302a-43: dbang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1784b:302a-44: rdo rje gcig pu ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02D1784b:302b-0: re re'i spyi bor dbang bskur ba @302b ni cod pan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1784b:302b-1: sngags rnams thams cad rnams kyi ni //
T02D1784b:302b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bsgom //
T02D1784b:302b-3: zhes le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1784b:305b-6: sems can gyi skye gnas bzhi pa'i 'brel pa dang
T02D1784b:305b-7: ldan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyas btab pa ste
T02D1784b:305b-8: / de bas na rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang padma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1784b:305b-9: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1784b:305b-10: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:305b-11: yang na phyag rgya ni phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin skyed par byed pa ;
T02D1784b:305b-13: des rgyas btab pas na phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1784b:305b-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1784b:305b-15: de nyid bsgom pa'i shes rab ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1784b:305b-16: phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1784b:305b-17: de rnams kyis 'gro ba thams cad rgyas btab pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02D1784b:305b-18: yang na phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams
T02D1784b:305b-19: kyi rang bzhin ni sa la sogs pa khams bzhi
T02D1784b:305b-24: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ni khams gsum pa rgyas btab pas na phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:305b-25: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dag go //
T02D1784b:305b-26: phyi rol gyi rim pas mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:305b-27: lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi po ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi po'o //
T02D1784b:305b-28: grva ni sgo'i grva rnams su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:305b-29: de'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje ni gtsug tor 'khor
T02D1784b:305b-30: los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po'i mtshan ma
T02D1784b:305b-31: ste / steng dang 'og tu dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:305b-32: rig pa'i rgyal po drug po ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po drug po'o //
T02D1784b:305b-34: mtshan ma drug tu rab tu grags //
T02D1784b:305b-36: sa nas brtsams te rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
T02D1784b:305b-37: bar du gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa
T02D1784b:305b-38: gang yin pa de'i dkyil 'khor du rim pa ji
T02D1784b:305b-39: lta ba bzhin du me long ni gzugs brnyan gyi
T02D1784b:305b-40: rang bzhin dang / bi wam ni brag ce'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:305b-41: dung ni chos kyi tshul khrims te dri bzang po'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:306a-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod kyi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:306a-3: 'dod chags las ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tsha ba sel bas /
T02D1784b:306a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:306a-5: chos 'byung ba ni sku gsung thugs dang /
T02D1784b:306a-6: sku gsum dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rang bzhin
T02D1784b:306a-7: phyag rgya drug po de dag rdo rje'i bdag po
T02D1784b:306a-8: ni rdo rje bdag po gang la yod pa de
T02D1784b:306a-9: ni rdo rje'i bdag po ste /
T02D1784b:306a-10: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:306a-11: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dang khro bo'i
T02D1784b:306a-12: rgyal po rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de
T02D1784b:306a-13: dag rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che
T02D1784b:306a-14: dang padma dang ral gri dang tho ba la sogs
T02D1784b:306a-15: pa dang / de'i rigs kyi kha dog ste kha dog lnga pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:306a-16: de las gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig ces bya ba ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya /
T02D1784b:306a-17: phyag rgya rigs kyi kha dog ni rnam par snang
T02D1784b:306a-18: mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang bar
T02D1784b:306a-19: brtags pa ni dgod par bya ste /
T02D1784b:306a-20: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02D1784b:306a-21: me tog 'dri ba'i lan bstan pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:306a-22: me tog ces bya ba ni lha mo nam mkha'i
T02D1784b:306a-23: khams te shes rab kyi padma'i lte ba'i nang na
T02D1784b:306a-24: khams sar pa ste rakta phral du dbyung ba'o //
T02D1784b:306a-25: de ni sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba ste /
T02D1784b:306a-26: sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las lces blangs shing rigs kyi rim pa ste /
T02D1784b:306a-27: rigs gsum gyi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlab cing dgod pa ni spyod par bya ste bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:306a-28: yang na btsun mo'i nam mkha'i khams ni shes rab kyi nam mkha'i ste /
T02D1784b:306a-29: de la rtsa re re la padma 'dab ma brgyad dang lte ba ste dgu'o //
T02D1784b:306a-30: de las byung ba'i khams rnams ni rakta dang shu kra dang dri chab bo //
T02D1784b:306a-31: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:306a-32: snga ma bzhin du dgong pa ni spyod pa ste sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:306a-33: yang na lha mo ni dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:306a-34: de'i nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D1784b:306a-35: de la sku la sogs pa dang khams rnams dang rnam par shes pa ste /
T02D1784b:306a-36: dgod pa ni nye bar bya ste me tog ces bya'o //
T02D1784b:306a-37: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1784b:306a-38: mchod rten dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:306b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad ni @306b chos dang longs spyod
T02D1784b:306b-1: rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin de bzhin
T02D1784b:306b-2: gshegs pa rnams kyi gzhi ni bzhugs gnas te gzhi
T02D1784b:306b-4: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:306b-5: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad ni shu kra la sogs pa khams lnga ste /
T02D1784b:306b-6: de rnams kyi bzhugs gnas ni gzhi ste shes rab kyi padma zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:306b-7: shes rab kyi padma ni mchod rten zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:306b-8: de yang rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D1784b:306b-9: rigs ba nam mkha' lnga dang 'dab ma brgyad dang
T02D1784b:306b-10: / lte ba ste mchod rten de nyid kyi 'khor lo bcu bzhi zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:306b-11: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang
T02D1784b:306b-12: chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1784b:306b-13: can gyi rdo rje ni mchod rten zhes bya ste
T02D1784b:306b-14: de ni rgyu'o // rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i ye
T02D1784b:306b-15: shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings la zhugs pas reg
T02D1784b:306b-16: pa ni de dang ldan ba 'khor lo ni dkyil
T02D1784b:306b-18: de ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:306b-19: la la na re snying ga la gnas pa zhes
T02D1784b:306b-20: bya ba de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog go
T02D1784b:306b-21: // sa bon gyi yi ge bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:306b-22: sa bon gyi yi ge ni bskyed pa'i don du yi ge rnams so //
T02D1784b:306b-23: gnas ni bskyed pa'i don te mi 'jig pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1784b:306b-24: rdo rje gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
T02D1784b:306b-25: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mi 'gyur ba
T02D1784b:306b-27: de bzhin du yi ge ni me long lta bu
T02D1784b:306b-28: la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid de
T02D1784b:306b-29: / chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rtag pa mi 'jig pas na yi ge ni sa bon rnams so //
T02D1784b:306b-30: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:306b-31: skul ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:306b-32: sad na ni 'od gsal ba la bzhugs pa sems
T02D1784b:306b-33: can gyi don du ldang bar bya bas sad pa
T02D1784b:306b-34: ste / sku gsung thugs kyi de kho na nyid
T02D1784b:306b-35: ni 'od gsal ba las ldang bar bya ba ni
T02D1784b:306b-37: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1784b:306b-38: yang na sku gsung thugs ni 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa ste gtso bo'i rtse gsum mo //
T02D1784b:306b-39: de'i sad ba ni sor mo'am lces bskul ba ste bskul ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:306b-40: yang na sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni sa bon gsum mo //
T02D1784b:306b-41: de rnams kyi bdud rtsi lnga sad pa ni 'od gsal bar byas pas bskul ba ste sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:306b-42: gtong ba dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:307a-0: 'od zer spro ba ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten @307a * //
T02D1784b:307a-1: gyi khams su sems can gyi ni don bya ba'i
T02D1784b:307a-2: phyir 'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba zhes bya ste
T02D1784b:307a-3: las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:307a-4: yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha rnams kyi nus pa dgug par bya ba'i phyir ram /
T02D1784b:307a-5: gdul dka' gdul bar bya ba'i phyir bka' nyan gtong
T02D1784b:307a-6: ba gang yin ba de ni gtong ba zhes bya
T02D1784b:307a-7: ste sgrub pa'o // spyan 'dren pa'i dri ba'i lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1784b:307a-8: spyan 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings
T02D1784b:307a-9: la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje can thams cad de ting
T02D1784b:307a-10: nge 'dzin gsum cir yang dgug cing gzhug pa de
T02D1784b:307a-11: ni spyan 'dren pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:307a-13: de dag gong bu'i tshul ni sngags kyi yi ge'i thig le'i gzugs sam /
T02D1784b:307a-14: yang byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i gzugs su bsdus pa ni gcig tu byas te /
T02D1784b:307a-15: snying ga'am rdo rje'i padma'am gdong gi sna'i rtse mor 'chi nga ba ste /
T02D1784b:307a-17: de las kyang mi g-yo ga dbang du bya ni bcings pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1784b:307a-18: de ni las kyi rgyal po mchog dang rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1784b:307a-19: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:307a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni
T02D1784b:307a-21: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1784b:307a-22: rnams kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:307a-23: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs ba'i dkyil 'khor gang
T02D1784b:307a-25: de'i tshe thig skung 'dzin pa'i slob ma rnams sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:307a-26: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo rgyas
T02D1784b:307a-27: btab pas bskyed par byas la bri ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:307a-28: brtag pa ni thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784b:307a-29: de la dgongs pa 'di yin te rnam par snang
T02D1784b:307a-30: mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas sku'i dkyil 'khor bri bar
T02D1784b:307a-31: 'dod pas rang gi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1784b:307a-32: du bsgoms la / slob ma ni 'od dpag med pa'am ni bskyod pa'am /
T02D1784b:307a-33: bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:307a-34: 'od dpag med pa'i rnal 'byor pas gsung gi dkyil
T02D1784b:307a-35: 'khor bri bar 'dod na bdag nyid ni 'od dpag
T02D1784b:307a-37: slob ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dam /
T02D1784b:307a-38: mi bskyod pa'am bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:307a-39: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:307a-40: bri bar 'dod na bdag ni mi bskyod par bsgoms
T02D1784b:307a-41: la / slob ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dam /
T02D1784b:307b-1: bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:307b-2: yang na slob ma ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:307b-3: de ni bskyed pa'i rim ba'o //
T02D1784b:307b-4: dbang bskur ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:307b-5: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba rgyud 'di la ni dpal gsang 'dus pa rnam pa gsum yin te /
T02D1784b:307b-6: lus dang ngag dang sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-7: de la bum pa'i dbang bskur gyis ni lus rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:307b-8: bskyed pa'i rim pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-9: gsang ba'i dbang gis ni ngag rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:307b-10: bdud rtsi myang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-11: shes rab kyi dbang gis ni sems rnam par dag bar 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:307b-12: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-13: de rnams kyi dbye ba dang rim pa ni le'u bcu drug pa las bshad do //
T02D1784b:307b-14: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba
T02D1784b:307b-15: ni shes rab kyi ye shes de nyid kyang bla
T02D1784b:307b-16: mas bstan pa ni bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:307b-17: 'dir shes rab ye shes ni bde ba chen po zhes bshad de /
T02D1784b:307b-18: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1784b:307b-19: dpe'i bde ba dang dpe las byung ba'i bde ba'o //
T02D1784b:307b-20: de la dpe'i bde ba ni shes rab ye shes yin la /
T02D1784b:307b-21: dpe las byung ba'i bde ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod pa yin te /
T02D1784b:307b-22: rang gi mngon sum pa'i tshad mas khong du chud
T02D1784b:307b-23: par bya ba'i phyir dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D1784b:307b-24: phyir ro// de nyid kyi phyir ye shes kyi sgras ma gsungs so //
T02D1784b:307b-26: dpe'i bde bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ji ltar 'byung bas yin te /
T02D1784b:307b-27: 'bras bu ni rgyu dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1784b:307b-28: de ltar ma yin te gang gi phyir de kho
T02D1784b:307b-29: na nyid kyi rgyu yod pa ma yin te rtag
T02D1784b:307b-30: pa'i phyir ro // rgyu dang bcas pa yin na
T02D1784b:307b-31: skad cig ma can dang 'jig par yang thal bar
T02D1784b:307b-33: chos nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rtag pa nyid kyis nam mkha' bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1784b:307b-34: dpe'i bde ba ni skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid la rgyu mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-35: de nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis de khas blangs pa yin la /
T02D1784b:307b-36: nye bar mtshon pa'i rgyu nyid mi rigs te /
T02D1784b:307b-37: zla ba bstan pa'i sor mo yang rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:307b-38: rgyu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa ni rang bzhin
T02D1784b:307b-39: gyis gyur pa yin pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no
T02D1784b:307b-40: // glo bur ba'i sprin dang 'dra ba'i dri ma
T02D1784b:307b-41: sel bar byed pa dpe la brten pa'i rigs pa
T02D1784b:308a-0: // yin no // de khas ma blangs na thams cad kyis @308a * //
T02D1784b:308a-1: sangs rgyas nyid thob pa thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1784b:308a-2: sgom pa la sogs pa don med pa dang rten par byed pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1784b:308a-3: bsod nams dang sdig pa la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:308a-4: de bas na dpe'i bde ba ni rgyu nyid ma yin te rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1784b:308a-5: / nye bar mtshon pa tsam nyid ni rigs te mar me bzhin no zhes sngar bshad zin te /
T02D1784b:308a-6: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
T02D1784b:308a-7: rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skabs su dbang gnyis po
T02D1784b:308a-8: dka' ba yin pa'i phyir de'i rim pa bshad par
T02D1784b:308a-9: bya ste / sngags kyi tshul du snod du rung ba ni sngags kyi tshul du dung ba'o //
T02D1784b:308a-10: snod du rung ba zhes bya ba rigs kyi dbye bas yin no //
T02D1784b:308a-11: gang gi phyir zhe sdang gi rigs kyi bud med
T02D1784b:308a-12: gang yin pa de ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs la
T02D1784b:308a-13: / de bzhin du gti mug la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D1784b:308a-14: can ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D1784b:308a-15: / can yin no // kha dog gis kyang gang
T02D1784b:308a-16: zhig nag po de ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs yin
T02D1784b:308a-17: / can yin no // pa dang / de bzhin
T02D1784b:308a-18: du dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog de ni
T02D1784b:308a-19: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs su shes
T02D1784b:308a-20: / can yin no // pa dang / par bya'o // las kyis kyang rigs shes par bya ste /
T02D1784b:308a-21: drag po la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:308a-22: de ltar rigs dpyad nas sngags snod du rung ba shes rab yin no //
T02D1784b:308a-23: mig yangs sngags zhes bya ba 'dis gzugs kyi phun sum tshogs pa nyid du bstan to //
T02D1784b:308a-24: me tog bcas pa zhes bya ba 'dis na tshod dang ldan pa yin te /
T02D1784b:308a-25: na tshod dang mi ldan na me tog mi ldan no //
T02D1784b:308a-26: sa bon 'byung zhes bya ba 'dis ni sa bon
T02D1784b:308a-27: 'dzad pa zhes 'jig rten las grags pa dang padma
T02D1784b:308a-28: can no // yang na gang gi tshe de'i me tog 'byung ba de'i tshe blang bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:308a-29: de dang 'dra bar shes par bya ba ni dam
T02D1784b:308a-30: tshig la sogs pa legs par bzlas pa gzung zhing
T02D1784b:308a-31: sngags pas slob ma las gsang ba'i dbang ni gsang
T02D1784b:308a-32: ba'i dbang ste sbas ba'i bka' drin sbyin par bya'o
T02D1784b:308a-33: // de nyid kyi rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:308a-34: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bshad gci la sogs
T02D1784b:308a-35: pa bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams bcom
T02D1784b:308a-36: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsams la de de
T02D1784b:308a-37: dang lhan cig rdo rje dang padma snyoms par 'jug
T02D1784b:308a-38: pas gnas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis mchog tu
T02D1784b:308b-0: dga' ba'i sgras de @308b dag dgug cing //
T02D1784b:308b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rtsa gsum ro
T02D1784b:308b-3: gcig par gyur pa'i rtsa dbus ma la zhu ste
T02D1784b:308b-4: / rdo rje'i lam nas byung zhing padma la gnas
T02D1784b:308b-5: pa'i byang chub kyi sems dung phor la sogs par
T02D1784b:308b-6: / blangs te / slob ma'i khar sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1784b:308b-7: kha cig na re rdo rje de nyid khar gzhug par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1784b:308b-8: dbang bskur ba ni rnam par rtog pa zad par byed pas na mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-9: de bzhin du gsang sngags kun ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:308b-10: pa'i sku la sogs pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pas
T02D1784b:308b-12: de bas dbang bskur ba 'di yis sngags kun dang sngags thams cad de /
T02D1784b:308b-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1784b:308b-14: las mchog gi tshogs rnams ni zhi ba la sogs
T02D1784b:308b-15: pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub rnal 'byor pas grub
T02D1784b:308b-16: par 'gyur ro zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1784b:308b-17: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-18: yang shes rab kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1784b:308b-19: mchog tu dad pa can ni dkon mchog gsum la sems dad pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-20: shes rab chen po ni thos pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:308b-21: rim gyis phul du byung ba'i ye shes thob pa'o
T02D1784b:308b-22: // gzugs bzang ni mdzes pa dang sgeg pa dang /
T02D1784b:308b-23: na tshod la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-24: sgrub pa po la dga' ba ni rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-25: sbyor ba gcig ni zla med pa'i sbyor ba ste sngags kyi tshul lo //
T02D1784b:308b-26: nyel bya ba goms pa ni lam de nyid du sgom pa la sogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1784b:308b-27: dam tshig dag ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:308b-28: dam tshig gi nang nas dam tshig can ni rnal
T02D1784b:308b-29: 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D1784b:308b-30: spyod pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab de blangs nas
T02D1784b:308b-31: mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang /
T02D1784b:308b-32: bsnyen bskur sngon du 'gro ba'i slob mas bla ma la yon du phul bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:308b-33: slob ma zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1784b:308b-34: rdo rje slob dpon gyis kyang rigs lnga dang sku
T02D1784b:308b-35: gsung thugs kyi sa bon byin gyis brlab par byas
T02D1784b:308b-36: la m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i gzugs su bskyed
T02D1784b:308b-37: cing rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1784b:308b-38: ldan pa'i sgrub pa po la de sbyin par bya'o
T02D1784b:308b-39: // de nas dam tshig dang sdom pa blang ba
T02D1784b:308b-40: dang las su rung ba'i rdo rje la 'jug pa
T02D1784b:308b-41: shes rab dang snyoms par 'jug par dang ldan par
T02D1784b:309a-0: rang gi snying gnas gti mug @309a * //
T02D1784b:309a-1: dga' ma la sogs pa spro zhing de'i khar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1784b:309a-2: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:309a-3: gti mug sbyor ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang
T02D1784b:309a-4: snyoms par 'jug pa gti mug dga' ma spros shing
T02D1784b:309a-5: de'i kha la bcug cing zhugs te /
T02D1784b:309a-6: de las byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur na /
T02D1784b:309a-7: slob ma gti mug rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:309a-8: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang shes
T02D1784b:309a-9: rab dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid ni mi bskyod
T02D1784b:309a-10: pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang don yod
T02D1784b:309a-11: grub pa zhe sdang dga' ma dang 'dod chags dga'
T02D1784b:309a-12: ma dang / rdo rje dga' ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan par spros te /
T02D1784b:309a-13: de'i khar bcug cing de las byung ba'i byang chub
T02D1784b:309a-14: kyi sems kyi rgyun gyis zhe sdang la sogs pa
T02D1784b:309a-15: dag par bya ba'i phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:309a-16: rgyun gyis slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:309a-17: de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1784b:309a-18: cho ga ste bskyed pa'i rim pa dang 'bras bu
T02D1784b:309a-19: dag go// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:309a-20: de nas lha mo de nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i
T02D1784b:309a-21: yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pa blangs nas rdo
T02D1784b:309a-22: rje can gyi slob ma ste /
T02D1784b:309a-23: de'i lag pa gnyis su bzung ste /
T02D1784b:309a-24: de'i bar na gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis slob ma'i
T02D1784b:309a-25: spyi bor lag pa bzhag cing nam mkha'i dbyings la
T02D1784b:309a-26: bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang por byas
T02D1784b:309a-27: la / de rnams kyi spyan sngar de de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1784b:309a-29: thabs gzhan ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
T02D1784b:309a-30: lus dal ba la sogs pa dang shin tu dka'
T02D1784b:309a-31: ba byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la sogs pa
T02D1784b:309a-33: rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par mi 'gyur te ma dag pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:309a-34: de bas rig pa 'di ni 'od gsal ba'i rig pa 'dis rig pas shes rab bo //
T02D1784b:309a-35: 'di ni bdag gis bying yis brlabs pa yin la
T02D1784b:309a-36: mchog ste dam tshig dang sdom pa mchog tu gyur
T02D1784b:309a-37: pa long shing ces bya ba ni tshig gi lhag
T02D1784b:309a-38: ma'o // gang phyir chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784b:309a-39: de dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa med
T02D1784b:309a-40: pas gnyis su med pa ste gnyis dang bral ba'o
T02D1784b:309a-41: // dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra bar 'phrul pas
T02D1784b:309b-0: dngos po gnyis te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i @309b
T02D1784b:309b-1: dngos po nyid du snang ba yin no //
T02D1784b:309b-2: de bas bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D1784b:309b-3: pa gzhom par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1784b:309b-4: dbang phyug ma'i ngo bor rig pa 'di dang khyod
T02D1784b:309b-5: kyis ni brlab par mi bya ste /
T02D1784b:309b-6: 'di dang bral bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1784b:309b-7: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas na sangs rgyas thab ste /
T02D1784b:309b-8: mar ni tshe zhes bya ba'i rig pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1784b:309b-10: bla na med pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la zhugs pas rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02D1784b:309b-11: gang zhig rmongs pa ni 'khrul pa'am brjed ngas pas
T02D1784b:309b-12: 'da' ba ni srung bar mi byed na de'i dngos
T02D1784b:309b-13: grub mchog ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang
T02D1784b:309b-14: gi mtshan nyid grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D1784b:309b-16: bdud rtsi lnga'i dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:309b-17: tha mal pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa dri ma ni bshad pa la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1784b:309b-19: snang ba ni dag pa nyid du snang ba ste /
T02D1784b:309b-20: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:309b-21: de bas na 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gal te bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1784b:309b-22: lcags kyu spyod na de'i tshe cung zad kyang skyon med de /
T02D1784b:309b-23: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching ba las sems
T02D1784b:309b-24: grol bar bya ba'i phyir sgom pa'i khyad par brten
T02D1784b:309b-25: par bya'o // de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:309b-26: ye shes lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga ste aom la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:309b-27: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par byas la /
T02D1784b:309b-28: bdud rtsi lnga ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar rims
T02D1784b:309b-29: la sogs pa'i sogs pa'i skyon sel bar byed par
T02D1784b:309b-30: 'gyur ro // sba ra ba ni yi ge aom gyis me tog spro bar bya'o //
