T02D1784b:309b-31: sreg pa ni padma'i snod kyi 'og na gnas pa'i rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyis so //
T02D1784b:309b-32: snang ba ni sad pa ste g-yon du bskor bas 'khor ba dang bems po ma yin par bya'o //
T02D1784b:309b-33: gzugs snang ba ni sbyang ba ste dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
T02D1784b:309b-34: de dag dang yi ge a'a:dang h'um dag gis bya ba'o //
T02D1784b:309b-35: sngags kyi sku rab sbyor ba ste /
T02D1784b:309b-36: rang gi yi dam gyi lha'i sbyor bas lag pa
T02D1784b:309b-37: dang lkog ma sbyang zhing nang gi sbyin sreg gi
T02D1784b:309b-38: rim gyis bdud rtsi lnga ni rdzas lnga bsdus pa
T02D1784b:309b-39: la las byung ba'i bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems
T02D1784b:309b-40: kyi ro bo bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:309b-41: de nyid rim par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:310a-0: bar snang ni snod kyi steng gi cha @310a * //
T02D1784b:310a-2: de la yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02D1784b:310a-3: 'og tu ni yi ge a'a: las byung ba'i padma
T02D1784b:310a-4: 'dab ma brgyad pas mtshan pa'i snod bsgoms te de
T02D1784b:310a-5: la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi yi ge aom gyis tshim
T02D1784b:310a-6: par byed pa'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bsams la
T02D1784b:310a-7: / yam dang ram las byung ba'i rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor dag gis sbar la /
T02D1784b:310a-8: rdo rje dang padma steng dang 'og tu mchod pa bzhin du 'dus par byas la /
T02D1784b:310a-9: tshim par bya ba'i ngo bo shel ltar dag pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsam ste /
T02D1784b:310a-10: rang gi snying pa las byung ba'i rno ba'i 'od
T02D1784b:310a-11: zer gyi tshogs kyi mtshon chas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T02D1784b:310a-12: gyi khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1784b:310a-13: bkug cing bdud rtsi la bcug ste /
T02D1784b:310a-14: sa bon lnga yongs su gyur pa la de bzhin
T02D1784b:310a-15: gshegs pa lngar rang gi lha mo dang snyoms par
T02D1784b:310a-16: zhugs pas yongs su gyur pas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1784b:310a-17: kyi ngo bo yi ge gsum gyis bying yis brlabs
T02D1784b:310a-18: pa de nyid kyis sbyang ba la sogs pa byas
T02D1784b:310a-19: pa lkog ma dang lce la sogs pa sbyang ba
T02D1784b:310a-20: la sogs pa'i rim gyis bza' bar bya ba ni
T02D1784b:310a-21: spyad par bya'o // gzhan du ni gal te rnal 'byor pas de ltar mi byed na /
T02D1784b:310a-22: de'i tshe 'grub mi 'gyur ni rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1784b:310a-23: po'i go 'phang thob par mi 'gyur te sgrub pa'o
T02D1784b:310a-24: // tha mal pa'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:310a-25: mi snang ba la sos pa ni ri lu la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i sgo nas dngos grub dang /
T02D1784b:310a-26: mig sman dang rkang mgyogs dang 'khor lo'i rig pa
T02D1784b:310a-27: 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa
T02D1784b:310a-28: de dag ni tha mal pa'i dngos grub yin te
T02D1784b:310a-29: longs spyod ster ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:310a-30: de bzhin du sangs rgyas ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1784b:310a-31: rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par byas pas na sangs rgyas
T02D1784b:310a-32: kyis bsgrubs te / rdo rje 'chang nyid dang sangs
T02D1784b:310a-33: rgyas nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i go 'phang ngo
T02D1784b:310a-34: kyis bsgrubs te / // gnyis po de yang de
T02D1784b:310a-35: bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung
T02D1784b:310a-36: ba'i mtshan nyid ni dngos grub mchog ces bya ste
T02D1784b:310a-37: thar pa ster bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:310a-38: de ni bsgrub pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:310a-39: rim pa gnyis par bsnyen pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:310a-40: thabs rnams bzhi po ni dbye ba rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1784b:310b-0: byang chub rdo rje ni rdo @310b rje 'chang chen pos so //
T02D1784b:310b-1: sgrub pa ni lha'i sku sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:310b-2: 'od gsal la rtog par byed pa gsungs zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-3: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud thams cad ni rdo rje 'jigs
T02D1784b:310b-4: byed dang rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud la sogs
T02D1784b:310b-5: pa'o // rnal 'byor pa ni rnam pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1784b:310b-6: sngags pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-7: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02D1784b:310b-8: bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni yan lag bzhi po mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-9: thun mong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tha
T02D1784b:310b-10: mal pa dang mchog gi dbye bas rnam pa gnyis
T02D1784b:310b-11: su bstan to // rdo rje bzhi po ni mngon
T02D1784b:310b-12: par byang chub lnga'i rim gyis bsnyen pa la sogs
T02D1784b:310b-14: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyis ni mchog gi bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-15: stong pa nyid la sogs pa rgyud thams cad las
T02D1784b:310b-16: gsungs pa'i dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting
T02D1784b:310b-17: nge 'dzin gsum gyi nang du bsdus par 'gyur ro
T02D1784b:310b-18: // de ni rdo rje bzhi po'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1784b:310b-19: tha mal pa'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-20: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:310b-21: ye shes ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1784b:310b-22: de nyid rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pas na bdud rtsi ste /
T02D1784b:310b-23: des ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa mchog ste /
T02D1784b:310b-24: phul du byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:310b-25: de nyid kyi phyir yan lag bzhi pa'i nang nas
T02D1784b:310b-26: bsnyen pa gcig pu ni sbyor ba drug gis te
T02D1784b:310b-27: / so sor sdud pa la sogs pa sbyor ba drug gis bya'o //
T02D1784b:310b-28: gzhan du na mchog gi dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:310b-30: so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1784b:310b-31: dbang po bcu zhes bya ba la sogs dpas rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02D1784b:310b-32: dbang po ni mig la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1784b:310b-33: don ni gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga'o //
T02D1784b:310b-34: de dag bsdus pa ni dbang po dag go //
T02D1784b:310b-35: dbang po yul dang bcu po de dag ni rang gi yul gzung bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1784b:311a-0: de blangs nas so sor ni rang gi yul re re la nye @311a * //
T02D1784b:311a-2: 'dod pa lnga nye bar spyod bas de ni so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1784b:311a-4: de rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:311a-5: 'dod pa lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul te /
T02D1784b:311a-6: de dag dbang po dang bcas pas gcig tu byas
T02D1784b:311a-7: la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du brtag
T02D1784b:311a-8: par bya ste / bsam gtan zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:311a-9: de'i yang bye brag lnga ste /
T02D1784b:311a-10: rtog pa dang dpyod pa ni rags pa dang phra ba'i rtog pa ste chags pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:311a-11: dga' ba dang bde ba ni lus dang sems kyi bde ba'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:311a-12: chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo
T02D1784b:311a-13: sems rtse gcig ni chags pa dang chags pa dang
T02D1784b:311a-14: bral ba dang chags ba bar ma med pa 'od
T02D1784b:311a-16: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:311a-17: gsang ba gsum 'byung ba ni yul dang dbang po
T02D1784b:311a-18: dang rnam par shes pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i
T02D1784b:311a-19: bde ba la 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa
T02D1784b:311a-21: rtog pa gsum yongs su spangs nas nyams su myong
T02D1784b:311a-22: ba ni spyod pa ste gnyis po de dag ni
T02D1784b:311a-24: de nas dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par rtog
T02D1784b:311a-25: pa yongs su spangs nas lus shin tu sbyangs pa
T02D1784b:311a-27: de nas lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang bral bas na sems shin tu sbyang ba ste /
T02D1784b:311a-28: bsdus par gyur ba'i bde ba bsdus pa ste nyams su myong ba ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1784b:311a-29: gnyis po de dag chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D1784b:311a-30: snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
T02D1784b:311a-31: de nas shes pa dang shes bya byung ba zang
T02D1784b:311a-32: ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa sangs rgyas gcig gi
T02D1784b:311a-33: rang bzhin nam mkha' kun ni khams gsum pa la
T02D1784b:311a-34: gnas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngo bo rang
T02D1784b:311a-35: gi sems ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin lnga par
T02D1784b:311a-36: shes par bya'o // de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:311a-37: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1784b:311a-38: de la thig le ni gsal ba nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1784b:311a-39: khams thams cad mtshungs pa nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1784b:311a-40: de ni bde ba chen po la spyod pa la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1784b:311b-0: de'i 'od zer spro ba dang @311b bsdu bas 'gro
T02D1784b:311b-1: ba'i don bya ba ni bya ba nan tan grub
T02D1784b:311b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang don
T02D1784b:311b-4: dam pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni shin
T02D1784b:311b-5: tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1784b:311b-6: shes so // de bas na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:311b-7: rlung dang nye ba'i rlung bcu nye bar sdud par byed pas gnas pa'i skabs su dbugs so //
T02D1784b:311b-8: 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni lus te /
T02D1784b:311b-9: de'i snying por gyur pas sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang /
T02D1784b:311b-10: 'gro ba dang 'o nga ba dang khong stong dang ldan pa'i phyir rol //
T02D1784b:311b-11: thig le'i gzugs de nyid ni gong bu'i gzugs kyis
T02D1784b:311b-12: ni phung po la sogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i
T02D1784b:311b-13: ngo bo yungs kar gyi tshad tsam rtsa dbus ma
T02D1784b:311b-14: dang rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas sna'i rtse mo
T02D1784b:311b-15: ste de'i rtse mor brtag pa ni bsdu bar bya'o
T02D1784b:311b-16: // rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa de bzhin
T02D1784b:311b-17: gshegs pa lnga'i 'od zer gyi tshogs steng nas kyang
T02D1784b:311b-18: // spro ba / srog dang rtsol ba ni srog dang rtsol ba ste ;
T02D1784b:311b-20: rang sngags ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1784b:311b-21: snying gar bsams pa ni sgom pa ste /
T02D1784b:311b-22: srog ni steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba kha dog lnga'i rlung ste /
T02D1784b:311b-23: thig ler gyur pa ni thig le dang dbyer med par gyur par bzhag pa ni bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1784b:311b-24: de'i tshe rang dbang ni snga ma bzhin du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1784b:311b-25: de bzhin du rin chen ni thig le'i rin chen de dag pa na /
T02D1784b:311b-26: gzung ba ni rdo rje'i rtse mo'am padma'i lte par
T02D1784b:311b-27: srog la sogs pa nye bar sdud cing gnas pa
T02D1784b:311b-28: gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa ste yan lag
T02D1784b:311b-29: bzhi pa'o // 'gog pa rdo rjer zhugs pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i sems te /
T02D1784b:311b-30: sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched du gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:311b-31: mtshan ma'i rtags de nye bar 'dzin ni lhun gyis
T02D1784b:311b-32: grub pa ste so sor snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1784b:311b-34: mtshan ma de yang byang chub rdo rje ste rdo
T02D1784b:311b-35: rje 'chang chen pos rnam pa lnga gsungs pa ni
T02D1784b:311b-36: bka' stsal to // sa'i khams chu la thim pa ni smig rgyu lta bur snang ba dang /
T02D1784b:311b-37: chu'i khams mel thim pa na du ba lta bur snang ba dang /
T02D1784b:311b-38: me'i khams rlung la thim pa na nam mkha'i dang 'dra ba ni mkha' snang ste /
T02D1784b:312a-1: ba srog chags kyi nor bu'o //
T02D1784b:312a-2: rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa la thim pa na mar me lta bu'o //
T02D1784b:312a-3: rnam par shes pa 'od gsal ba la thim pa
T02D1784b:312a-4: ni nyi ma phyed kyi dri ma med cing rlung
T02D1784b:312a-5: med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba snang bar 'gyur
T02D1784b:312a-6: ro // mtshan ma de dag brtan par bltas nas /
T02D1784b:312a-7: rdo rje'i lam nas thig le'i 'od zer spro zhing
T02D1784b:312a-8: de dag gis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams shing
T02D1784b:312a-9: de dang 'dra ba rjes su 'dra ba la dmigs
T02D1784b:312a-10: te / rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku lta bu
T02D1784b:312a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spro ba ni rjes su
T02D1784b:312a-12: dran pa ste yan lag lnga pa'o //
T02D1784b:312a-13: de la ni de'i so sor snang ba ste /
T02D1784b:312a-14: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu so sor snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:312a-15: de nas thabs dang shes rab snyoms bar 'jug pa
T02D1784b:312a-16: ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis su med
T02D1784b:312a-17: par sbyor bas dngos po thams cad ni sems can
T02D1784b:312a-18: dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi dbye bas gnas pa
T02D1784b:312a-19: dang / sngar spros pas de dag gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ni gcig tu byas te /
T02D1784b:312a-20: kun rdzob dang don dam ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis bsdus pa ste /
T02D1784b:312a-21: dbus su ni de gnyis tha mi dad pa'i dbus te /
T02D1784b:312a-22: gzugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:312a-23: de yang ci tsam gyi sems can rdzogs pa ni
T02D1784b:312a-24: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes
T02D1784b:312a-26: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yan lag drug par gnas par rab tu grags pa'o //
T02D1784b:312a-27: phan yon bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:312a-28: so sor sdud la snyoms par 'jug pa ni spyod
T02D1784b:312a-29: pa rnam pa gsum gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1784b:312a-30: lam yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas yul rnams
T02D1784b:312a-31: la spyod na sngags rnams thams cad ni de bzhin
T02D1784b:312a-32: gshegs pa thams cad de mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D1784b:312a-33: pas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02D1784b:312a-34: de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02D1784b:312a-35: bsam gtan ni yan lag lnga pa ye shes ni
T02D1784b:312a-36: de mngon du rtogs pa de la snyoms par 'jug
T02D1784b:312a-37: cing thob nas / mngon shes lnga ni lha'i mig la sogs pa thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1784b:312a-38: yul dang dbang po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:312b-0: de nas srog dang rtsol ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid @312b dang ;
T02D1784b:312b-1: sngags kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02D1784b:312b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor lo'i rig pa
T02D1784b:312b-3: 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par dang ldan pa
T02D1784b:312b-4: rnams kyis gzigs pa ni lta bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1784b:312b-5: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i stobs ni brtan pa nyid
T02D1784b:312b-6: kyis rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1784b:312b-7: po sku yang dag 'jug ni thob par 'gyur te
T02D1784b:312b-8: / 'dzin ba ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:312b-9: de bzhin du rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba ni
T02D1784b:312b-10: rjes su dran pa thob pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:312b-12: rjes su dran pa'i spro ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:312b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang 'od kyi dkyil
T02D1784b:312b-14: 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis 'od kyi tshogs zil gyis
T02D1784b:312b-16: ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur na'o //
T02D1784b:312b-17: sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor ba brag pa med par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1784b:312b-18: de ltar yan lag drug sgom par byed pa'i rnal
T02D1784b:312b-19: 'byor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang
T02D1784b:312b-20: / rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02D1784b:312b-21: mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa thob par
T02D1784b:312b-22: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni rnal 'byor ro
T02D1784b:312b-23: // da ni thabs bzhi bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:312b-24: snying po de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:312b-25: re zhig dang por rdo rje 'chang chen po la
T02D1784b:312b-26: sogs pa'i gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1784b:312b-27: pa'i rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid sgom pa sngon
T02D1784b:312b-28: du 'gro bas ye shes gsum yongs su gyur pa
T02D1784b:312b-29: las skyes pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge h'um
T02D1784b:312b-30: las byung ba'i rdo rje bsam zhing de'i lte bar
T02D1784b:312b-31: yi ge h'um dgod de de las byung ba'i 'od
T02D1784b:312b-32: zer gyi tshogs te mtshon cha dam pa ni rtse
T02D1784b:312b-33: mo'i cha rno ba nam mkhar spro zhing des ji
T02D1784b:312b-34: ltar 'dod pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo bkug cing bcug
T02D1784b:312b-35: ste / sems ni sems kyi rnam par lha'i tshogs
T02D1784b:312b-36: sngags kyi ngo bor byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:312b-37: pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du bsams te yongs
T02D1784b:312b-38: su gyur pa las sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba ste
T02D1784b:312b-39: ste / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sku bskyed la /
T02D1784b:313a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:313a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva
T02D1784b:313a-4: bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1784b:313a-5: pa sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig
T02D1784b:313a-6: dang sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:313a-7: gzhan yang rang gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor pa'i
T02D1784b:313a-8: tshogs spro zhing de'i dbus su gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:313a-9: pas byang chub sbyor ba'i sgom pa ste /
T02D1784b:313a-10: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1784b:313a-11: sems de ni dkyil 'khor pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i
T02D1784b:313a-12: gtso bo'i sku / ye shes kyi gzugs de 'od
T02D1784b:313a-13: du zhu zhing thig le yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad
T02D1784b:313a-14: tsam bsgom par bya ba ste nye bar sgrub pa'o
T02D1784b:313a-15: gtso bo'i sku / // de ni dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02D1784b:313a-17: las kyi rgyal po mchog ste gsum pa'i thabs so //
T02D1784b:313a-18: de ltar byas kyang rnal 'byor bas dngos grub thob par ma gyur na /
T02D1784b:313a-19: de'i tshe sbyin pa'i thabs brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1784b:313a-20: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa la rnam
T02D1784b:313a-21: pa gnyis ni zla ba gnyis dang zla ba phyed
T02D1784b:313a-22: gnyis dang / zla ba gcig dang zla ba phyed dang /
T02D1784b:313a-24: zhag drug gis dngos grub grub par ma gyur na /
T02D1784b:313a-25: de'i tshe sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo spros te /
T02D1784b:313a-26: nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa 'dis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1784b:313a-27: gzugs rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam pa lnga'i me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la /
T02D1784b:313a-28: aom badzra pushpa a'a:h'um zhes pas mchod do //
T02D1784b:313a-29: de nas sgra rdo rje ma spros shing rol mo dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1784b:313a-30: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta shapta p'u dza me
T02D1784b:313a-31: gha sa mu dra pha ra na sa ma ya
T02D1784b:313a-32: shri ye h'um zhes pas mchod do //
T02D1784b:313a-33: de nas dri rdo rje ma spro zhing dung phor na gnas pa'i bzhi mnyam pa'i dris /
T02D1784b:313a-34: aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um sv'ah'a zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la byung pa bya'o //
T02D1784b:313a-35: ro rdo rje ma spro zhing snod la gnas pa'i
T02D1784b:313a-36: bdud rtsi lnga spro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1784b:313a-37: mchod cing de rnams kyis kyang zhes te /
T02D1784b:313a-38: bde ba chen po dam pa'i dgongs pas spyod do //
T02D1784b:313a-39: aom badzra aa mri ta a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1784b:313a-40: de nas reg bya rdo rje ma spro zhing rnam
T02D1784b:313a-41: pa sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dbul bar bya ste
T02D1784b:313b-0: / aom sab resha badzra a'a:h'um sv'a h'a zhes @313b brjod do //
T02D1784b:313b-1: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma spro
T02D1784b:313b-2: zhing 'khyud pa dang tsumba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D1784b:313b-4: aom sarbba ta tha' ga ta ya nu r'a ga
T02D1784b:313b-5: na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod
T02D1784b:313b-6: cing / mchod pa'i mthar lha mo bsdu zhing mi
T02D1784b:313b-7: bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs
T02D1784b:313b-8: su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1784b:313b-9: cing / la bstod la / de rnams dbang bskur
T02D1784b:313b-10: ba thob nas rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas
T02D1784b:313b-11: btab cing tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1784b:313b-12: cing / la bstod la / rnams bzhugs shing /
T02D1784b:313b-13: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta par ma no ba
T02D1784b:313b-14: re ga te ta sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D1784b:313b-15: zhes brjod cing langs nas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1784b:313b-16: de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes dang po sbyor
T02D1784b:313b-17: ba la sogs pa gsum dang sbyin pa'i thabs so
T02D1784b:313b-18: // zla drug la sogs par de ltar byas na
T02D1784b:313b-19: yang gal te 'grub bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe
T02D1784b:313b-20: dbye ba'i thabs brtsams par bya ste /
T02D1784b:313b-21: gal te zla ba drug gis ma mthong ba ni
T02D1784b:313b-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje
T02D1784b:313b-23: 'chang chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub mi stsol
T02D1784b:313b-24: na // lan gsum ni dam tshig sems dpa' dang
T02D1784b:313b-25: ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i
T02D1784b:313b-26: na // dbye ba dang / ji ltar bshad pa'i
T02D1784b:313b-27: bsrung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa
T02D1784b:313b-28: spyod pa dang ldan pa sngar bshad pa'i sku'i rnal
T02D1784b:313b-29: 'byor dang ldan pas rang rang gi snying gar rdo
T02D1784b:313b-31: de'i h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer lcags kyu ngag
T02D1784b:313b-32: gi lam nas phyung ste de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1784b:313b-33: las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bsgoms te /
T02D1784b:313b-34: de la bka' bsgo zhing rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1784b:313b-35: shing rtas song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1784b:313b-36: spyan sngar phyin nas rdo rje tho bas de rnams
T02D1784b:313b-37: kyi thugs dkar brdeg cing 'di skad brjod par bya'o
T02D1784b:313b-38: // che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
T02D1784b:313b-39: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
T02D1784b:313b-40: rtag tu khyed la dad pa can //
T02D1784b:313b-41: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
T02D1784b:313b-42: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
T02D1784b:313b-43: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
T02D1784b:313b-44: ces bya ba brjod pas zhag bdun gyis dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:313b-45: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang dbye ba'i thabs so //
T02D1784b:314a-0: de ltar byas na yang gal te 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe @314a * //
T02D1784b:314a-1: chad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:314a-2: gang gi tshe byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang nyid ma grub ste thob par ma gyur na /
T02D1784b:314a-3: de'i tshe drag shul sbyor ni chad pa'i thabs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1784b:314a-4: de'i tshe de'i ye shes 'grub pa ni nges par dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:314a-5: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1784b:314a-6: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i padmar ha las byung
T02D1784b:314a-7: ba'i sna tshogs 'od zer h'um las byung ba'i dkyil
T02D1784b:314a-8: 'khor bsgoms te / de'i steng du ram las byung
T02D1784b:314a-9: ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge phat dgod cing
T02D1784b:314a-10: rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rjer yang bskal pa'i me
T02D1784b:314a-11: ltar 'bar ba dang 'dra bar bsams te /
T02D1784b:314a-12: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las byung ba'i sna
T02D1784b:314a-13: tshogs 'od zer gyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1784b:314a-14: bkug cing rigs kyi dbye ba ni rigs kyi rjes
T02D1784b:314a-15: su 'brang ba'i khro bo'i gzugs kyis ye shes kyi
T02D1784b:314a-16: lha mo'i padmar bcug la rdo rje'i phur bus btab
T02D1784b:314a-17: ste dbang du byas pa de dang lhan cig bdag
T02D1784b:314a-18: nyid tha mi dad par bsgoms la /
T02D1784b:314a-19: khro bo'i 'khor lo phyi rol du spro zhing rang gi lha'i sku la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:314a-20: de ting nge 'dzin gsum dang chad pa'i thabs te bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
T02D1784b:314a-21: de la don bsdus pa 'di yin te /
T02D1784b:314a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar mi slu bar gsungs te /
T02D1784b:314a-23: yid ches pa dang sdom pa la gnas pa lha'i
T02D1784b:314a-24: sku brtson pa la bskyed pa lha rnams kyi rjes
T02D1784b:314a-25: su gnang bas gang gi tshe zla ba drug dang
T02D1784b:314a-26: zla ba gnyis dang gcig dang zla ba phyed kyis
T02D1784b:314a-27: 'grub par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis
T02D1784b:314a-28: bsgrub pa brtsams par bya ste /
T02D1784b:314a-29: sa bon bhr'um las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa'i
T02D1784b:314a-30: nang du bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la gnas
T02D1784b:314a-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa gang yang
T02D1784b:314a-32: rung brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D1784b:314a-33: ldan pas rang gi ba spu dag nas byung ba
T02D1784b:314a-34: lha mo'i tshogs kyis mngon par dga' ba'i sangs rgyas
T02D1784b:314a-35: kyi zhing du bzhugs pa'i ye shes kyi lha la
T02D1784b:314a-36: bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1784b:314a-37: de rnams kyis kyang snyan ba dang /
T02D1784b:314a-38: yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis gsol ba btab cing spyan drangs te /
T02D1784b:314a-39: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig
T02D1784b:314b-0: tu tha mi dad par @314b bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D1784b:314b-1: bya'o // de'i tshe zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:314b-2: de ltar byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur na de'i tshe
T02D1784b:314b-3: rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka la gnas
T02D1784b:314b-4: pa'i padma dang zla ba rdo rje'i chang zungs kyi
T02D1784b:314b-5: h'um las byung ba'i gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po dang
T02D1784b:314b-6: 'dra ba sa bon gsum gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1784b:314b-7: rdo rje lcags kyu rang gi kha nas phyung zhing
T02D1784b:314b-8: de yongs su gyur ba las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal
T02D1784b:314b-9: po yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1784b:314b-10: steng du ram las byung ba gru gsum gyi shing
T02D1784b:314b-11: rta la gnas par byas la bskal pa'i me dang
T02D1784b:314b-12: nyin ma ltar 'bar ba bka' bsgo bar bya zhing
T02D1784b:314b-13: gtang bar bya'o ; / de song zhing ye shes
T02D1784b:314b-14: sems dpa' de nyid kyi thugs 'bar ba tho bas
T02D1784b:314b-15: gtang bar bya'o ; brdeg cing / che ge mo zhig rdo rje che //
T02D1784b:314b-16: khyed rnams kyis ni brtan par gnas //
T02D1784b:314b-17: khyed la rtag tu dad pa can //
T02D1784b:314b-18: dam tshig bsrung ba la brtson pa //
T02D1784b:314b-19: dbang bskur ba dang rjes gnang thob //
T02D1784b:314b-20: de la dngos grub stsol bar mdzod //
T02D1784b:314b-21: ces brjod cing ldog par bsams te /
T02D1784b:314b-22: de lta na zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:314b-23: de lta yin na yang gal te dngos grub mi
T02D1784b:314b-24: stsol na de'i tshe rig ma'i padma'i nang du ha
T02D1784b:314b-25: las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1784b:314b-26: de'i lta bar h'um las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1784b:314b-27: 'khor nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs pa bsams te
T02D1784b:314b-28: / de'i steng du yi ge phat dang yi ge
T02D1784b:314b-29: ram yongs su gyur nas bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar
T02D1784b:314b-31: gsang ba'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du 'bar bar
T02D1784b:314b-32: bsams la de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu yang
T02D1784b:314b-34: des ye shes kyi lha'i thugs kar 'bigs shing 'gugs
T02D1784b:314b-35: pa dang zhugs shing lha mo'i padma'i gnas su me
T02D1784b:314b-36: long gi dkyil 'khor du gzhug go //
T02D1784b:314b-37: gsang ba'i rdo rje de yang me'i 'od spro ba padma la zhugs te /
T02D1784b:314b-38: rig ma'i khar bcug pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba de
T02D1784b:314b-39: de'i spyi bor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba phab
T02D1784b:314b-40: par bsam mo // de dag thams cad kyis ni thal bar 'gyur bar bsams te /
T02D1784b:314b-41: de'i shes pa mar me dang mtshungs pa yi ge
T02D1784b:314b-42: h'um gi gzugs can yongs su gyur pa las rdo
T02D1784b:314b-44: rang gi lus la zhugs shing de dang lhan cig
T02D1784b:315a-0: dbyer med par bdag nyid bsgoms na zhag @315a *
T02D1784b:315a-1: // bdun nyid kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig ldang ba'i rig par nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:315a-2: rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sdum pa dang /
T02D1784b:315a-5: chad pa'i rim pa shes par bya'o //
T02D1784b:315a-6: de ni bsgrub pa'i phyogs gcig go //
T02D1784b:315a-7: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:315a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:315a-9: pas rang gi rig ma dang snyoms par 'jug cing
T02D1784b:315a-10: mchog tu chags pa'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1784b:315a-11: dgug cing rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D1784b:315a-12: spyan ma nas brtsams te reg bya rdo rje ma'i bar du lha mo dgu'i tshul du spros te /
T02D1784b:315a-13: des ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1784b:315a-14: sems can gyi don byas la dgug cing bsgrub bya
T02D1784b:315a-15: ni rang gi rig ma'i sku la zhugs te /
T02D1784b:315a-16: yang spyan la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi spro zhing
T02D1784b:315a-17: phyogs bzhi la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1784b:315a-18: dbus su lnga'i bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D1784b:315a-19: 'khor lo can thams cad bsdu zhing lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes shing /
T02D1784b:315a-20: sngags thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D1784b:315a-21: mchog tu dga' ba'i dus su mi gsung bar 'gyur
T02D1784b:315a-22: zhing / de'i tshe byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1784b:315a-23: de kho na nyid bsgoms pa ni zhugs shing thim
T02D1784b:315a-24: zhing / par bya'o // de nas khyod ni rdo
T02D1784b:315a-25: rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs
T02D1784b:315a-26: su bcad pa bzhi pos bskul zhing sad nas sems
T02D1784b:315a-28: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po dang las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:315a-29: nang gi bdag nyid kyi rim pas dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:315a-30: dus gsum rdo rje ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315a-31: de'i rang bzhin ni de'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1784b:315a-32: ye shes ni de'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes bsdus par bsams la /
T02D1784b:315a-33: de bzhin du ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:315a-34: pa bzhin du lus ni lus kyang bsgom par bya'o
T02D1784b:315a-35: ; / de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin pa'i rig ma'i padmar zhugs te /
T02D1784b:315a-36: kha dog de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po 'dra ba'i kha dog ste dkar po'o //
T02D1784b:315a-37: thugs ka nas phyung zhing ro ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1784b:315a-38: rdo rje'i lam nas spro zhing rang gi rgyu ni
T02D1784b:315b-0: rig ma'i padma'i nang du dbang bskur @315b bar bya
T02D1784b:315b-1: ste / phye ba ni bsgrub par bya ba 'bras
T02D1784b:315b-2: bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par
T02D1784b:315b-4: de nas gzhan gyi don gyis byed par 'dod pas sngags ni phyung ba'i sngags te /
T02D1784b:315b-6: chos ni zhal gsum pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315b-7: dbye bar gyur ba ni spro bar bya ste /
T02D1784b:315b-8: rigs ni las kyi phyag rgya ma'am /
T02D1784b:315b-9: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ye shes kyi padma'i nang nas spor bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:315b-10: de dang yin zhe na 'khor los sgyur ba drug gtsug tor te /
T02D1784b:315b-11: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315b-12: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315b-13: rdzu 'phrul che ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1784b:315b-14: 'khor los sgyur ba ni gtsug tor te /
T02D1784b:315b-15: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315b-16: 'dod pa kun ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:315b-17: rdo rje bdag po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02D1784b:315b-18: de dag spro zhing le'u bcu bdun pa las gsungs pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1784b:315b-19: nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:315b-20: cho ga'i sbyor ba ni bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas so //
T02D1784b:315b-21: ye shes ni mchog tu dga' ba'i ye shes dang
T02D1784b:315b-22: chags pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo
T02D1784b:315b-23: rje ni rig ma'i padma'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang
T02D1784b:315b-24: gnyis su med par byed pa ni ro gcig par
T02D1784b:315b-25: byed pa ni sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:315b-26: gzhan yang sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis ni /
T02D1784b:315b-27: rig ba'i skyes bu rdo rje can ni ye shes
T02D1784b:315b-28: kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa rdo rje
T02D1784b:315b-29: 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas rig ma'i padma'i dkyil
T02D1784b:315b-30: 'khor de nyid las bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1784b:315b-32: de rnams kyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
T02D1784b:315b-33: yang zhal gsum pa la sogs pa lta bu shar phyogs la sogs par rim gyis zhugs te /
T02D1784b:315b-34: dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom par bya'o zhes pa sgrub pa chen por bshad do //
T02D1784b:315b-35: dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i chog bshad par bya ste ;
T02D1784b:315b-36: sa gzung ba ni bsnyen pa'i dus te /
T02D1784b:315b-37: de la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1784b:315b-38: thams cad du dbang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:315b-39: de nas sa brko zhing gang bar byas la zug
T02D1784b:315b-40: rdu'i skyon thams cad gdon par mi nus na de'i
T02D1784b:316a-0: tshe nye bar bsgrub pa'i dus te @316a * //
T02D1784b:316a-1: sa spyong ba'i dus na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D1784b:316a-2: aom aa mri ta kunda li a'a:h'um phat ces bya
T02D1784b:316a-3: ba'i sngags kyis sa'i dbus su lag pa btab na
T02D1784b:316a-4: stobs dang ldan pas sbyang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:316a-5: de nas sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus
T02D1784b:316a-6: su sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri
T02D1784b:316a-7: bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag nyid
T02D1784b:316a-8: ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ni rnam par snang
T02D1784b:316a-9: mdzad la sogs pa lha'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:316a-10: sgrub pa chen po'i dus ni thig btab pa'i dus /
T02D1784b:316a-11: de la sku ni slob ma dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /
T02D1784b:316a-12: sangs rgyas bdag po ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ltos la 'od dpag tu med pa'am /
T02D1784b:316a-13: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bsgoms /
T02D1784b:316a-14: gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos te rnam
T02D1784b:316a-15: par snang mdzad dam mi bskyod pa'am 'od dpag tu
T02D1784b:316a-16: med pa'am / rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bsgoms te /
T02D1784b:316a-17: khyab bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:316a-18: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis gsang ba ste /
T02D1784b:316a-19: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1784b:316a-20: mchog ni dam pa'i rnal 'byor ba ste /
T02D1784b:316a-21: sgrub pa po rnams kyi yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1784b:316a-22: de ltar phye ba na bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba shes shing rtogs nas /
T02D1784b:316a-23: dngos grub ni rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1784b:316a-24: gzhan du na bskal pa bye bas kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:316a-26: zhi ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02D1784b:316a-27: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang skyob pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen te /
T02D1784b:316a-28: de rnams kyis kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni phul du byung ba'i tshig ste /
T02D1784b:316a-30: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:316a-31: bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa ni shes rab dang thabs so //
T02D1784b:316a-32: de dag sbyor ba ni tsumba na dang a'a lingga na dang /
T02D1784b:316a-33: na kha du sha na dang btab pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1784b:316a-34: phyi rol gyi bya ba ni bsnyen par bshad do //
T02D1784b:316a-35: snga ma bzhin du sngags las bskyed pa sngon du
T02D1784b:316a-36: 'gro bas rdo rje dang padmar mnyam par sbyar ba
T02D1784b:316a-38: sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs pas de dag gi sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:316b-0: rang rig @316b pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
T02D1784b:316b-1: bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni sgrub
T02D1784b:316b-3: de nyid thabs las byung ba ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
T02D1784b:316b-4: ye shes de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1784b:316b-5: dpal ldan ni bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ste ;
T02D1784b:316b-6: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gnas so //
T02D1784b:316b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
T02D1784b:316b-8: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir thabs ni rgyu yin la /
T02D1784b:316b-9: 'di ni thabs las byung ba ste /
T02D1784b:316b-10: de nyid kyi phyir chos rnams ni dngos po rnams kyi de nyid chos nyid de /
T02D1784b:316b-11: rang bzhin dang de nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1784b:316b-12: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02D1784b:316b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'ang de //
T02D1784b:316b-15: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1784b:316b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa de nas 'gyur //
T02D1784b:316b-18: da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ni //
T02D1784b:316b-19: 'od gsal pas ni rnam dag pas //
T02D1784b:316b-20: skad cig de la ma lus mthong //
T02D1784b:316b-22: de ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu'o //
T02D1784b:316b-23: da ni las kyi tshogs 'dri ba'i lan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:316b-24: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:316b-25: las gang dang gang gis rnal 'byor pas de byed par rtsom na /
T02D1784b:316b-26: de dang 'dra ba'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1784b:316b-27: zhi ba'am drag po'am de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1784b:316b-28: lhan cig drag po'i las la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:316b-29: bskyed cing nam mkha'i dbyings la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1784b:316b-30: gshegs pa rnams la dam tshig mi bzad pa ni
T02D1784b:316b-31: drag shul gyi spyod pa bsgom par zhu bar bya'o
T02D1784b:316b-32: // dam tshig ni rang gi bdag nyid kyi lus
T02D1784b:316b-33: te sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin
T02D1784b:316b-34: gshegs pa'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la bsrung
T02D1784b:316b-35: // bar bya'o // yang na gtsug tor dam tshig
T02D1784b:316b-36: ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa
T02D1784b:316b-38: ji ltar cho ga gsungs pa las byung ba ni
T02D1784b:316b-39: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa las
T02D1784b:316b-40: 'byung ba srung ba'i 'khor lo bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:316b-41: de ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D1784b:316b-42: de dang rjes su mthun pa ni de dang 'dra
T02D1784b:317a-0: ba'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i tshul gyis rang @317a *
T02D1784b:317a-1: // gi 'khor lo ni khro bo'i 'khor la bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:317a-2: de bzhin du sgrub pa ni gdug pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1784b:317a-3: lus gang yin pa de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1784b:317a-5: de nas de'i nyes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la
T02D1784b:317a-6: sogs pa la gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las ngan
T02D1784b:317a-7: pa ste ; de'i lus la gnas pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1784b:317a-8: la ni 'gro ba thams cad la khyab par byed
T02D1784b:317a-9: pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsgrags par bya
T02D1784b:317a-11: 'di ni dkon mchog gsum gnod byed //
T02D1784b:317a-12: pha dang ma ni gsod par dga' //
T02D1784b:317a-13: dam pa'i chos la smod brtson pa //
T02D1784b:317a-14: slob dpon gsod cing gdul bar dka' //
T02D1784b:317a-15: bstan pa la sogs rim pas kyang //
T02D1784b:317a-16: lam la brten pa ma yin pa //
T02D1784b:317a-17: bcom ldan 'das de ring bdag gis ni //
T02D1784b:317a-18: de la drag shul mngon spyod bgyi //
T02D1784b:317a-20: de nas gdug pa'i sems can de la gsad par
T02D1784b:317a-21: bya ba'i don du khro bo de dag byung ba
T02D1784b:317a-22: ni phyogs bcur song bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317a-23: de rnams kyis de bkug cing rang gi 'khor lo
T02D1784b:317a-24: ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcug nas
T02D1784b:317a-25: / ral gri la sogs pas gcod par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317a-26: yang na ji ltar gsungs pa ni le'u bco lnga
T02D1784b:317a-27: pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas ni de las byung ba
T02D1784b:317a-28: ni bskyed pa / gzugs brnyan ni de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs te /
T02D1784b:317a-29: khro bos khyab pa'i sems ni drag shul dang ldan
T02D1784b:317a-30: pa'i sems kyis gcer bu dang skra grol bar gyur
T02D1784b:317a-31: cing rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon
T02D1784b:317a-32: pas de mnan cing g-yas brkyang bas gnas bas lho
T02D1784b:317a-34: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo'i sngags brjod
T02D1784b:317a-35: pas rang gi snying ga nas khro bo'i 'khor lo
T02D1784b:317a-36: spros te / sna tshogs ni bran dang bran mo dang /
T02D1784b:317a-37: pho nya dang pho nya mo'i bka' dang bka' nyan
T02D1784b:317a-38: mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'khor dang
T02D1784b:317a-39: bcas pa yi ge h'um gis brdeg par bya ba'i
T02D1784b:317a-40: phyir bka' bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1784b:317a-41: de dag song zhing sgrub pa rdo rje can ni
T02D1784b:317a-42: rnal 'byor pa'i bka' bsgrub par bya ba'i don du
T02D1784b:317a-43: / bsgrub bya ni zhags pas bcings la tho bas
T02D1784b:317a-44: brdeg / khro bo'i rgyal po ni khro bo'i tshogs
T02D1784b:317a-45: kyis bkug cing 'jigs pa ni 'jigs pas khyab cing
T02D1784b:317a-46: brdung ba ni skyabs med pa /
T02D1784b:317a-47: skrag pa ni skyabs dang bral ba /
T02D1784b:317b-0: gyur pa ni mig @317b bzlog pa /
T02D1784b:317b-1: bsgrub bya ni dgug par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317b-2: de nas sgrub pa po la bsgrub bya de don
T02D1784b:317b-3: du gnas par mthong zhing de'i gzugs brnyan la phab
T02D1784b:317b-5: de'i rdo rje gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon tshar du gnas pa /
T02D1784b:317b-6: phur bu'i sngags mi gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317b-7: spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga la sku
T02D1784b:317b-8: gsung thugs kyi sa bon gyi gzugs la phur bus
T02D1784b:317b-9: gdab pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1784b:317b-10: de nas yams ni sdug bsngal lo //
T02D1784b:317b-11: nye bar 'tshe ba ni sha za la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:317b-12: nad ni rims la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:317b-13: sna tshogs yul las byung ba ni dug nag po brtsegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:317b-14: 'byung ba ni gang las byung ba de ni 'byung ba ste /
T02D1784b:317b-18: lta ba'i dug la sogs pa'i sprul rnams so //
T02D1784b:317b-19: sprul rnams kyi dug de bkug cing gzugs brnyan de'i
T02D1784b:317b-20: mgo bo la sogs pa la gzhug cing snga ma
T02D1784b:317b-21: bzhin du phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317b-22: de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin bya ba ni phyogs dang /
T02D1784b:317b-25: rim pa dang mthun pa'i sngags kyis ni khro bo'i sngags dang /
T02D1784b:317b-27: stsogs pa'i sgras ni rdzas la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:317b-28: phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang sbyor bar bya ba ni sbyor ba bzhi'i rim gyis rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1784b:317b-29: yang na sngar bshad pa'i khro bo'i gzugs dang khro
T02D1784b:317b-30: bo'i sngags dang ldan pas khro bo'i sngags zlos pas
T02D1784b:317b-31: 'gro ba'i gzugs brnyan mtshan ma gcig la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:317b-32: sa ru / rdo rje lcags kyus byin gyis brlabs
T02D1784b:317b-33: pa ni rkang pa g-yon pas mnan cing shing ma
T02D1784b:317b-34: da na'i mel khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1784b:317b-35: gnas pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzugs
T02D1784b:317b-36: brnyan du ma bu dum bur gtub cing bsregs na
T02D1784b:317b-38: yang na gdug pa'i sems can ni re zhig mkha' la spyod pa ste /
T02D1784b:317b-39: bya rog dang bya rgod dang kang ka la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:317b-40: sa la spyod pa ni spyang ki dang dom dang dred la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:317b-41: sa 'og la spyod pa ni chu srin dang rus sbal la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:317b-42: de dag khros par gyur pa ni kha sbyor phye
T02D1784b:318a-0: zhing 'jigs pa mig zlog pa la rdul gyis @318a
T02D1784b:318a-1: * // lus byugs pas steng dang 'og las khrag
T02D1784b:318a-2: byung bas zos par gyur pa ni dum bu dum
T02D1784b:318a-3: bur zos par gyur pas rab tu brtags pa bsams
T02D1784b:318a-5: khyad par ni yi ge h'um gi rnam pa'i shes
T02D1784b:318a-6: pa dpal ldan mi bskyod pa'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor
T02D1784b:318a-7: pas yongs su bskor ba chos ston pa'i drung du
T02D1784b:318a-9: yang na rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi thig le la 'jug go //
T02D1784b:318a-10: 'o na srog gcod pa zhes bya ba ni bcom
T02D1784b:318a-11: ldan 'das kyis mdo sde de dang der rnam par
T02D1784b:318a-12: smin pa bzod dka' bar gsungs te /
T02D1784b:318a-13: gang zhig srog gcod pa ni mi gdug pa //
T02D1784b:318a-14: drag po khrag gis lag pa byug / sdig pa'i las ni kun spyod pa //
T02D1784b:318a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs na /
T02D1784b:318a-18: de bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ji ltar 'gal ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D1784b:318a-20: srog chags zhes bya ba ni thams cad do //
T02D1784b:318a-21: 'tshe bar byed pa ma yin te /
T02D1784b:318a-22: 'on kyang gang zhig sdig pa chen po'i las can
T02D1784b:318a-23: thabs mkhas kyis kyang gdul bar mi nus na mnar
T02D1784b:318a-24: med pa'i dmyal bar lhung ba dang /
T02D1784b:318a-25: nye bar bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen
T02D1784b:318a-26: po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags dang phyag
T02D1784b:318a-27: rgya'i rim pas gsod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
T02D1784b:318a-28: skyed par byed de tshar gcod pa'i sgo nas phan
T02D1784b:318a-30: gal te gcig ni gsod 'gyur na //
T02D1784b:318a-31: mang po bde ba ldan gyur te //
T02D1784b:318a-32: de ni bsod nams tshogs chen po //
T02D1784b:318a-33: gzhan du na ni sdig pa che //
T02D1784b:318a-35: 'o na bsad pa ni tshe dang bral ba ste /
T02D1784b:318a-36: de ji ltar na mtshon cha la sogs pas gnad
T02D1784b:318a-37: gcod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid yin pa de
T02D1784b:318a-38: bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas kyang yin
T02D1784b:318a-39: te / de bas na de'i rnam par smin pa ni mtshungs pa nyid do //
T02D1784b:318a-40: gang gi phyir pha rol po ni bdag nyid kyi srog dang bral ba ni mi 'dod de /
T02D1784b:318a-41: de ni thams cad 'dod do zhes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1784b:318a-42: de ltar ma smra shig / sngags la sogs pa'i
T02D1784b:318a-43: rim gyis srog dgug par byas pa ni pha rol
T02D1784b:318a-44: ni sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi /
T02D1784b:318b-0: 'on kyang rmi lam du sna tshogs @318b kyi kun
T02D1784b:318b-1: dga' ra ba la sogs pa mthong ba bzhin du
T02D1784b:318b-2: yid bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1784b:318b-4: thams cad kyi srog gces shes smras pa gang yin pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1784b:318b-5: de ltar yin na 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:318b-6: srid pa'i longs spyod bcos ma ma yin na yang
T02D1784b:318b-7: thams cad ni zhen pa spang bar bya ba'i don
T02D1784b:318b-8: du bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu
T02D1784b:318b-9: gnyis don med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:318b-10: de bas na de'i sdig pa spong ba'i don du
T02D1784b:318b-11: srog gces pa yin na yang 'gugs na skyon ni
T02D1784b:318b-13: gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas 'khor los sgyur
T02D1784b:318b-14: ba'i rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bor ba bzhin du
T02D1784b:318b-15: ha cang thal bar 'gyur zhes sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:318b-16: zhi ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:318b-17: zhi ba 'dod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1784b:318b-18: zhi ba'i sems ni 'jam pa'i sems dang phyi rol gyi yo byad kyang 'jam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:318b-19: rgyas par byed par 'dod na sems ni rgyas pa
T02D1784b:318b-20: dang rdzas kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur bya'o
T02D1784b:318b-21: // dbang ni rgyal po la sogs pa dbang du
T02D1784b:318b-22: byed na sems chags pa dang phyi rol gyi rdzas
T02D1784b:318b-24: gtum pa ni drag po'i las te gsod pa'i las
T02D1784b:318b-25: byed na sems khro ba dang phyi rol gyi rdzas
T02D1784b:318b-27: zlum po dang gru bzhi dang zur gsum dang zla gam gyi rnam pa ste me thab po //
T02D1784b:318b-28: bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'i rigs dang dmangs rigs kyi khyim la me'o //
T02D1784b:318b-29: 'o ma can gyi shing dang ma da na'i shing
T02D1784b:318b-30: dang padma'i rtsa ba dang tsher ma rnams ni yam
T02D1784b:318b-31: shing ngo // wa sham dang boo sha ta dang dza:hri dang h'um phat ni sngags spel ba'o //
T02D1784b:318b-32: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag po ni gos so //
T02D1784b:318b-34: shel dang gser dang bzhi mnyam dang mi rus kyi phreng ba'o ;
T02D1784b:318b-35: /'o ma dang mar dang padma dang /
T02D1784b:318b-39: sha chen la sogs pa ni bsreg rdzas so //
T02D1784b:318b-40: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1784b:318b-41: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1784b:318b-42: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02D1784b:318b-43: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba ni stang stabs so //
T02D1784b:319a-3: g-yon la zur du blta ba dang /
T02D1784b:319a-4: dpral ba lta ba ni lta ba'o //
T02D1784b:319a-7: g-yon sku skra yo ba dang /
T02D1784b:319a-8: grol ba ni cha lugs so //
T02D1784b:319a-12: rtse gcig pa ni rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D1784b:319a-13: dngul dang gser dang zangs dang lcags las brdungs pa ni phur bu'o //
T02D1784b:319a-14: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang /
T02D1784b:319a-15: nag po ni thig skud do //
T02D1784b:319a-16: 'o ma dang chu dang ga bur gyi chu dang khrag gis gang ba ni mchod yon no //
T02D1784b:319a-24: mi bskyod pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1784b:319a-35: nyin mo dang mtshan phyed ni dus so //
T02D1784b:319a-39: nam mthong gong ma ni rgyu skar ro //
T02D1784b:319a-44: spen pa ni gza'o byis pa dang /
T02D1784b:319a-58: dbyar zla ra ba ste zla ba rnams so //
T02D1784b:319a-62: lce bzhi pa ni dril bu rnams so //
T02D1784b:319a-66: zangs dung ni rol mo rnams so //
T02D1784b:319a-70: sme sha can ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma'o //
T02D1784b:319a-79: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su zhi ba dang rgyas pa'o //
T02D1784b:319a-80: nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su dbang dang mngon spyod do //
T02D1784b:319b-0: nyi ma byang du ldog pa'i dus su @319b zhi ba dang rgyas pa'o //
T02D1784b:319b-1: lho phyogs su ldog pa'i dus su dbang dang mngon spyod do //
T02D1784b:319b-4: steng du 'gro ba dang lho ru 'gro ba ni me'i rtags so //
T02D1784b:319b-8: 'ug pa'i skad ni mtshan ma rnams so //
T02D1784b:319b-18: long ba la sogs pa ni glo bur ba'i rtags so //
T02D1784b:319b-22: phur bu rnams ni cod pan no //
T02D1784b:319b-30: ral gri rnams ni phyag mtshan rnams so //
T02D1784b:319b-32: glang po rin po che dang /
T02D1784b:319b-33: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
T02D1784b:319b-34: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang /
T02D1784b:319b-35: btsun mo rin po che dang /
T02D1784b:319b-36: dmag dpon rin po che dang /
T02D1784b:319b-37: 'khor lo rin po che ni nor yin no //
T02D1784b:319b-40: sha dang cha dang tsha ba gsum ni lha bshos so //
T02D1784b:319b-42: padmas bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1784b:319b-44: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o//
T02D1784b:319b-49: yungs kar gyi mar khu dang /
T02D1784b:319b-52: dri zhim pa'i til mar dang /
T02D1784b:319b-53: til mar chen po ni mar me'o //
T02D1784b:319b-54: padma'i rtsa ba'i snal ma dang /
T02D1784b:319b-55: 'o ma can gyi shing gi pags pa dang /
T02D1784b:319b-56: ras dmar po dang zhag ni sdong bu'o //
T02D1784b:319b-64: ka ra b'i ra ni me tog go //
T02D1784b:319b-66: shing drung gi rtsa ba dang /
T02D1784b:319b-68: sum mdo ni gnas kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1784b:319b-72: sprin dang bcas pa ni zhag go //
T02D1784b:319b-73: gtsang po la khrus byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:319b-74: mtsho la khrus byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:319b-75: tsandan la sogs pas khrus byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:319b-76: dri ma can ma bkrus pas ni lus kyi cha lugs kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1784b:320a-0: @320a * // de ni bye brag nyis brgya ston to //
T02D1784b:320a-1: rnam pa gzhan ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyi las rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:320a-4: // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byams
T02D1784b:320a-5: pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D1784b:320a-6: the tshom rnams ni sngar bshad pa 'dri ba rnams
T02D1784b:320a-7: rtsom pa ni lan btab nas /
T02D1784b:320a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bya ba rdzogs
T02D1784b:320a-9: pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni rig pa
T02D1784b:320a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du sku gsung thugs la bzhugs
T02D1784b:320a-11: shing / mi bsrung bar bzhugs par gyur pa ni ro gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro ;
T02D1784b:320a-12: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dri ba lus pa tsam gyi phyir /
T02D1784b:320a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1784b:320a-14: pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1784b:320a-15: po la / 'di ni 'og nas bshad pa'i bstod
T02D1784b:320a-16: pa'i rgyal po ni mchog tu gyur pa'i bstod pas
T02D1784b:320a-17: byams pa la sogs pa bstod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:320a-18: thams cad sku ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1784b:320a-19: sku'i rigs thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:320a-20: thugs kyi rigs thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:320a-21: gsung gi rigs thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:320a-22: thams cad mdzad pa ni rin chen dang /
T02D1784b:320a-23: don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:320a-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1784b:320a-25: zhes bya ba la ni lus ngag yid kyis 'dud
T02D1784b:320a-27: phyag btsal pa gnyis pa bstan pa ni dad pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir te /
T02D1784b:320a-28: rab tu byed pa las kyang ji skad du /
T02D1784b:320a-29: phyag 'tshal 'dud ces bya ba la sogs pas dad
T02D1784b:320a-30: pa'i khyad par gyis phyag btsal ba drug kyang bstan
T02D1784b:320a-31: pa ste / de ni las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1784b:320a-32: kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sku
T02D1784b:320a-33: gsung thugs ni rdo rje'i zhes bya ba rnam par
T02D1784b:320a-34: snang mdzad la sogs pa dang ro gcig par gyur
T02D1784b:320a-35: pas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
T02D1784b:320a-36: de'i sku la sogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ni /
T02D1784b:320a-37: sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na sems
T02D1784b:320a-38: can thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs
T02D1784b:320a-39: pa nyid de / de'i rigs dang ldan pa ni
T02D1784b:320a-40: sems can thams cad yin no zhes rgya cher gsungs
T02D1784b:320b-0: pa nyid de / pa'i phyir ro // de @320b dang 'dra bar sems can yin na /
T02D1784b:320b-1: sngar bshad pa'i drag po'i las kyis gal te gsod par gyur na /
T02D1784b:320b-2: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:320b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad bsad pas na /
T02D1784b:320b-4: sgrub pa'i dbang po rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1784b:320b-5: de dag la ji ltar sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur /
T02D1784b:320b-6: gal te gos par gyur na 'bras bu ni rdo
T02D1784b:320b-7: rje 'chang nyid de ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur te
T02D1784b:320b-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1784b:320b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin can /
T02D1784b:320b-12: rdo rje 'chang chen pos byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02D1784b:320b-13: byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sku rdo rje'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:320b-14: mchod pa chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1784b:320b-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la bod pa'o //
T02D1784b:320b-16: de nyid kyi phyir legs bzhi ste /
T02D1784b:320b-17: shin tu phul du byung ba'i gnas su zhugs pa'i phyir /
T02D1784b:320b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis legs so legs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D1784b:320b-19: gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon rnal
T02D1784b:320b-20: 'byor gang yin pa de ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs
T02D1784b:320b-21: pas tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1784b:320b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1784b:320b-23: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pas na /
T02D1784b:320b-25: byang chub rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1784b:320b-27: byang chub rdo rje can no //
T02D1784b:320b-28: dngos rnams thams cad ni sgyu ma bzhin du shes pa dang /
T02D1784b:320b-29: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T02D1784b:320b-30: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1784b:320b-31: pa de la bsod nams dang sdig pa'i rnam par
T02D1784b:320b-33: gang gi phyir 'od gsal ba la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang sdig pa dang /
T02D1784b:320b-34: de'i 'bras bu ni bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro med pas na /
T02D1784b:320b-35: de'i tshe byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de /
T02D1784b:320b-36: thar par rab tu gsungs so //
T02D1784b:320b-37: 'gro ba rnams kyang yang dag bshad //
T02D1784b:320b-38: las rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa //
T02D1784b:320b-39: de yi rang bzhin yongs shes pas //
T02D1784b:320b-40: ma skyes pa yang bstan pa yin //
T02D1784b:321a-2: mgon po de ni rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa des ni /
T02D1784b:321a-3: gdug pa can bla ma la sogs smod par byed pa la /
T02D1784b:321a-4: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas mngon spyod byed na /
T02D1784b:321a-5: de'i tshe sems can thams cad rang gis byas pa'i las kyis /
T02D1784b:321a-6: ngan song ni mnar med pa la sogs par skye bar mi 'gyur gyi /
T02D1784b:321a-7: 'on kyang shin tu rnyed par dka' ba bskal pa
T02D1784b:321a-8: bye bas 'thob pa'i byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang
T02D1784b:321a-9: nyid de / rnyed mi dka' ba ni rnyed sla'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:321a-10: sngar byas pa'i las kyis mi zad pa'i dmyal ba'i
T02D1784b:321a-11: 'bras bu skye bo de dag gis nyams su myong
T02D1784b:321a-12: ba'i phyir / gal te dmyal bar skyes par gyur na /
T02D1784b:321a-14: ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1784b:321a-15: rgyas btab pa ni byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa
T02D1784b:321a-16: / byang chub rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bor 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:321a-17: de bas na de ni mchog tu phan btags pa ste /
T02D1784b:321a-18: mchog tu gyur pa'i bka' drin sems can de rnams te /
T02D1784b:321a-19: gdug pa rnams la rnal 'byor pa des byas pa
T02D1784b:321a-20: yin no zhes shes par bya ba ni rtogs par
T02D1784b:321a-21: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:321a-22: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:321a-24: bdag nyid chen po ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1784b:321a-25: rnal 'byor pa des phan 'dogs pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:321a-26: tshar gcod pa ni gsod pa la sogs pa'i las byed na /
T02D1784b:321a-27: de'i tshe sgrub pa chen po bskyed pa'i rim pas las kyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02D1784b:321a-28: rdzogs pa'i rim pas ni bde ba chen po ste /
T02D1784b:321a-29: byas nas ni skyed par byas la /
T02D1784b:321a-30: las rnams ni sngar bshad pa rtsom par byed na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1784b:321a-31: de ni dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa dang rang bzhin la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:321a-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:321a-33: rdo rje thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa'i chos te /
T02D1784b:321a-34: gsod pa'i las kyang thugs rje chen pos byas pa /
T02D1784b:321a-35: thos shing mnyan nas dga' zhing ni thos pas so //
T02D1784b:321a-36: mgu ba ni bsam pas so //
T02D1784b:321a-37: rab tu dga' ba ni sgom pas dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D1784b:321a-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la legs so zhes gsol to //
T02D1784b:321a-39: mgon po chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1784b:321a-40: thub pa chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1784b:321a-41: chos rnams chen po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1784b:321b-0: thugs rje chen @321b po ni bskyod pa'o //
T02D1784b:321b-1: de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba ni bzhi'o //
T02D1784b:321b-2: dad pa'i dbang gis ni tshig gnyis so //
T02D1784b:321b-3: la lan re thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis zer ro //
T02D1784b:321b-4: de ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02D1784b:321b-5: ae ma ho zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D1784b:321b-6: kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs rje chen po ste /
T02D1784b:321b-7: mchog ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa las phul du byung ba las /
T02D1784b:321b-8: dri ma med ni thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis bsdus pa /
T02D1784b:321b-9: gang zhig mi bzad pa'i las kyis gsod pa'i las byas na yang /
T02D1784b:321b-10: gdug pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'bras
T02D1784b:321b-11: bu nyid stsol ba ni ster bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1784b:321b-13: de bas na bcom ldan 'das la kho bo cag
T02D1784b:321b-14: the tshom dang bral ba rnyed pa yang brnyes so
T02D1784b:321b-15: zhes bya ba ste sgrub pa'o //
T02D1784b:321b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin
T02D1784b:321b-17: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang
T02D1784b:321b-18: chen pos byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad
T02D1784b:321b-20: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D1784b:321b-21: rdo rje rigs la sogs pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1784b:321b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1784b:321b-23: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di la dbang bskur
T02D1784b:321b-24: ba gang yin pa ni sngags pa ste /
T02D1784b:321b-25: rnal 'byor pa de zab mo'i chos thos nas /
T02D1784b:321b-26: sgra ji bzhin pa tsam la brten cing 'jigs par mi bya ste /
T02D1784b:321b-28: skrag par gyur par mi bya ba ni bsam pas so //
T02D1784b:321b-29: yang dag par skrag par mi bya ba ni bsgom pas so //
T02D1784b:321b-30: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas ni gtan
T02D1784b:321b-31: tshigs gsungs te gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1784b:321b-32: rnams byang chub rdo rje las byung ba ni /
T02D1784b:321b-33: zhe sdang las skyes pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i rang
T02D1784b:321b-34: bzhin gyi sku gang yin pa de rnams kyis gsod
T02D1784b:321b-35: pa la sogs pa'i phrin las gang yin pa de
T02D1784b:321b-36: ni khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes zhes gsungs
T02D1784b:321b-37: pa'i phyir / de dag thams cad byang chub rdo
T02D1784b:321b-38: rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po las skyes pa
T02D1784b:321b-39: pa'i phyir / ni byung ba'o // chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rigs pas /
T02D1784b:321b-40: gang yang rung ba'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyis las
T02D1784b:321b-41: byad par 'dod na de rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i
T02D1784b:322a-0: chos nyid dang / snying rje chen po la dmigs par @322a * //
T02D1784b:322a-2: de'i tshe skyon cung zad kyang med do //
T02D1784b:322a-3: 'on kyang sgra ji bzhin pa tsam bzung nas chos nyid spangs te /
T02D1784b:322a-4: snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam par spyod pa spangs nas /
T02D1784b:322a-5: chos spong bar mi bya ba ni smod par mi bya ba ste /
T02D1784b:322a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni zab pa dang don du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1784b:322a-7: de bas na kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ni chos nyid de /
T02D1784b:322a-8: bsdus pa ni rjes su dran pa dang bsam par bya'o //
T02D1784b:322a-9: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02D1784b:322a-10: bdag kyang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes

T02D1784b:322a-13: cad bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o
T02D1784b:322a-14: // de nas zhes bya ba la byams pa la
T02D1784b:322a-15: sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams the tshom bral
T02D1784b:322a-16: bar gyur cing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D1784b:322a-21: bye brag gis bstod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste

T02D1784b:322a-23: de'i 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid la bstod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:322a-24: gang zhig dus gsum rdo rje ni dus gsum gyi
T02D1784b:322a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni rang bzhin can
T02D1784b:322a-26: no // thugs ni spro ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1784b:322a-27: srid dang thar gyur pa ni thar pa ster pa de dag la mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1784b:322a-28: zhi ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:322a-29: sgrib pa med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:322a-30: dag pa ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D1784b:322a-31: nam mkha'i ngo bo ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:322a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi lhag pa'i byang chub ni ye shes lnga ste /
T02D1784b:322a-33: dbang phyug dam pa rnams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1784b:322a-34: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1784b:322a-35: de lta bu khyed la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1784b:322a-36: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga ni rnam par
T02D1784b:322a-37: dag pa'i mtshan nyid can de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D1784b:322a-38: bdag nyid dang / skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1784b:322b-0: yul rnam @322b par dag pa'i bdag nyid gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:322b-1: sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams par dag pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1784b:322b-2: spyan dang m'a ma k'i dang na bza' dkar mo dang /
T02D1784b:322b-4: m'a ma k'i chen mo'i rang bzhin to /
T02D1784b:322b-5: byang chub kyi sems ni don dam pa dang de dang 'dra ba ni kun rdzob ste /
T02D1784b:322b-6: de'i bdag nyid khyed la lus la sogs pa rnams kyis de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1784b:322b-7: de bzhin du gti mug la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1784b:322b-8: phung po la sogs pa'i bdud dang /
T02D1784b:322b-9: log par lta ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1784b:322b-10: de'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo 'phags pa gshin
T02D1784b:322b-11: rje mthar byed la sogs pa sgo srung bzhi'i rang
T02D1784b:322b-12: bzhin dang / rig pa ni rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa khro bo'i lha mo ste /
T02D1784b:322b-13: de dang lhan cig tu sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug pas 'byung ba ni skyed par 'gyur ba /
T02D1784b:322b-14: rtag tu rab tu 'brel ba ni dus thams cad du ste /
T02D1784b:322b-15: rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni byed pa dang yan
T02D1784b:322b-16: lag gi bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa
T02D1784b:322b-17: de gtso bor gyur pa'i dga' ba ni rab tu
T02D1784b:322b-18: dga' ba ste / des myos pa'i dngos po ni dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1784b:322b-19: der gyur pa ni thob pa ste khro bo'i rgyal po rnams so //
T02D1784b:322b-20: de ltar rnam par dpyad na byang chub sems dang
T02D1784b:322b-21: 'dra ba ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs
T02D1784b:322b-23: spros pa la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa sems 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
T02D1784b:322b-24: de'i rang bzhin ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa gtsug tor drug go //
T02D1784b:322b-25: de bzhin du rmongs pa ni gti mug go //
T02D1784b:322b-28: de dag ni khams gsum pa yin te de nyid sgrib pa'o //
T02D1784b:322b-29: rdo rje ni snying rje dang shes rab gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1784b:322b-30: khams gsum gyi shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1784b:322b-31: byang chub sems dang 'dra ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D1784b:322b-32: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba dang sbyor ro //
T02D1784b:322b-33: bstan pa la bstod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:322b-34: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:322b-35: thog med dngos med ni rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1784b:322b-36: thob pa'i thabs su gyur pa shes rab dang thabs
T02D1784b:322b-37: las byung ba ni stong pa dang snying rje'i bdag
T02D1784b:322b-38: nyid can / spros pa dang rnam par bral ba ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste /
T02D1784b:323a-0: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i @323a * //
T02D1784b:323a-2: de bzhin du gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1784b:323a-3: brtul zhugs ni rigs pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1784b:323a-4: dam tshig sbyor ba ni dam tshig sgom pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1784b:323a-5: sgom par byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1784b:323a-6: byang chub rdo rje dang 'dra ba ni rdo rje
T02D1784b:323a-7: 'chang chen po dang 'dra ba de la rtag tu
T02D1784b:323a-8: phyag 'tshal lo // gang zhig rnyed pa la sogs pa yan lag bzhi gtso bor gyur pa /
T02D1784b:323a-9: dngos grub thabs kyi mchog ni bsgrub bya /
T02D1784b:323a-10: sgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1784b:323a-11: pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa sgom
T02D1784b:323a-12: par byed pa de dag rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1784b:323a-14: de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02D1784b:323a-15: de bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa yan lag
T02D1784b:323a-16: de nyid rdo rje bzhi'i rim gyis sgrub par byed
T02D1784b:323a-17: pa dang / dman pa'i dngos grub ni rtogs pa'i lha'i sgrub par byed pa sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1784b:323a-18: bla ma'i drin gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1784b:323a-19: cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka'
T02D1784b:323a-20: drin gyis sgrub par byed pa ni snga ma bzhin
T02D1784b:323a-21: no // bstan par bya ba la bstod par bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:323a-22: rgyud 'di bshad par gyur pa'i tshe nyan pa ni don dang bral ba sgra tsam thos pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-23: 'don pa ni rgyun ma chad par kha ton byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-24: klog pa ni res 'ga' 'don pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-25: sems pa ni thos nas bsam par byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-26: yang na glegs bam la dad pas mchod par byed pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-28: de dag la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1784b:323a-29: gang zhig sgrub pa po rgyud 'di nyid kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs dang /
T02D1784b:323a-30: sngags dang 'khrul 'khor dang phyag rgya sgrub par byed
T02D1784b:323a-31: pa de la zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin
T02D1784b:323a-32: no // de bzhin du gang zhig mthong ba ni glegs bam tsam mthong ba dang /
T02D1784b:323a-33: reg pa ni lag pas reg pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-34: grong dang dgon pa la sogs par yang glegs bam dran pa'am /
T02D1784b:323a-36: ming ni 'dus pa zhes bya ba thob pa'am /
T02D1784b:323a-37: tsam ni phyogs gcig gi ming ste gsang ba'am /
T02D1784b:323a-40: 'dri bar byed du bcug pa dang /
T02D1784b:323a-44: sgom pa la sogs pa gang yin pa /
T02D1784b:323b-0: @323b dad par byed pa ni sems dad par byed pa dang /

T02D1784b:323b-2: cing phyogs gcig dran par yang bshad par bya ste
T02D1784b:323b-3: / phyogs gcig dran pa ni yi ge phyogs gcig dran pa dang /
T02D1784b:323b-4: don gyi phyogs gcig dran pa gang yin pa de
T02D1784b:323b-5: ni byang chub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1784b:323b-7: de la rtag phyag 'tshal ba ni phyag 'tshal ba
T02D1784b:323b-8: ni phyag btsal ba dang btud de zhes bya ba'i
T02D1784b:323b-9: don to // bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'og tu /
T02D1784b:323b-10: rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1784b:323b-11: bstod pa'i tshig 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bstod cing bshad nas /
T02D1784b:323b-12: 'dren pa kun ni dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po la ste /
T02D1784b:323b-13: de'i don ni bstan pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1784b:323b-14: sgrub pa po dang bstan par bya ba la bstod cing /
T02D1784b:323b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rgyud ni
T02D1784b:323b-16: rgyun te rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas
T02D1784b:323b-18: rgyud kun ni bya ba dang /
T02D1784b:323b-20: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud de /
T02D1784b:323b-21: de rnams kyi dngos grub dang ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin pas na bdag po'o //
T02D1784b:323b-22: bde ba'i thabs yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
T02D1784b:323b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na /
T02D1784b:323b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do//
T02D1784b:323b-25: gsang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par zhugs pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1784b:323b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par byed pas na 'dus pa'o //
T02D1784b:323b-27: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu yin pas na 'byung ba'o //
T02D1784b:323b-28: legs par mnyan pas na legs par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1784b:323b-30: 'di ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud de //
T02D1784b:323b-31: rjes yi rang ni mngon par dga' zhing nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1784b:323b-32: de ni las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02D1784b:323b-33: 'di skad gsungs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1784b:323b-34: bstod pa'i tshig brjod nas so //
T02D1784b:323b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni
T02D1784b:323b-36: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang byams pa la
T02D1784b:323b-37: sogs pa'o // nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po pa /
T02D1784b:323b-38: sku la sogs pa la rang gi sku la sogs pa zhugs shing gcig tu gyur te /
T02D1784b:323b-39: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsung bar
T02D1784b:324a-0: gyur pa ni bde ba chen po dmigs @324a *
T02D1784b:324a-1: // te gnas par gyur to zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1784b:324a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa
T02D1784b:324a-3: la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs ni sngags sam gzugs
T02D1784b:324a-4: te / de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba /
T02D1784b:324a-5: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ni bsod nams dang ye
T02D1784b:324a-6: shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i
T02D1784b:324a-9: de rnams kyi ston pa ni lam gyi tshig ste
T02D1784b:324a-10: de dag byin gyis rlob brjod par byed pa gang
T02D1784b:324a-11: yin pa de ni gsang ba thams cad ston pa
T02D1784b:324a-12: rdo rje ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes
T02D1784b:324a-13: bya'o // le'u zhes bya ba la /
T02D1784b:324a-14: ji ltar gos kyis chu sbrang la sogs pa las
T02D1784b:324a-15: srung ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1784b:324a-16: sel bar byed pas na gos dang 'dra ba ste
T02D1784b:324a-17: de 'dzin cing len par byed pas na pa ta
T02D1784b:324a-18: la ste / de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la yang le'u zhes bya'o //
T02D1784b:324a-19: tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02D1784b:324a-20: rgyud kyi 'grel pa las le'u bco brgyad pa'i tshig gi don rgya cher bshad pa'o //

T02D1784b:324a-22: byang chub sems ni rab gsal byed //
T02D1784b:324a-23: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed nas ni //
T02D1784b:324a-25: tshig gsal mdo rgyu spun las byung //
T02D1784b:324a-26: thabs dang shes rab me 'bar ba //
T02D1784b:324a-27: klu sgrub snying po bdag gis ni //
T02D1784b:324a-28: mdor na 'grel pa sdom du bsdus ;
T02D1784b:324a-29: / dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D1784b:324a-30: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud rgyal dang //
T02D1784b:324a-31: bla ma la ni dad che bas //
T02D1784b:324a-33: dpal ldan rgyal po de gzhon nu //
T02D1784b:324a-34: dus su lo ni bco brgyad la //
T02D1784b:324a-35: 'phags pa lha yis byas pa'i dpal ldan gnas ni shar phyogs su //

T02D1784b:324a-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis bdag gis rgyud 'grel 'di ni rnam par brtsams //
T02D1784b:324a-38: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni //
T02D1784b:324a-39: 'grel pa sgron ma rnam rgyas dang //
T02D1784b:324a-40: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa mun //
T02D1784b:324a-41: de nyid kyis ni 'joms par shog /
T02D1784b:324a-42: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa rdo rje theg pa chen po pa /
T02D1784b:324a-43: dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /

T02D1784b:324a-46: nu bum pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing gtan
